abs.description:
Returns the absolute value of int or float.
(effectively removes any negative sign)

accuracy.example:
local.actor accuracy 100
// Or
local.actor.accuracy = 100
local.accuracy = local.actor.accuracy

actionanimend.description: Called when the action animation has finished.

activate.description:
FuncBeam: Activate the beam.
UseObject: Allow the useobject to be used.

activatenewweapon.description:
Activate the new weapon specified by useWeapon.
'handsurf' allows specifying which hand to use for the player.

activatepapers.description: The activation of the papers item. Used in models/items/papers.tik.

activatetrigger.description: Activates all of the targets for this trigger.

activator.description: Get's entity who last activated this trigger.

active.description: Make the SinkObject active, so that it will respond to players touching it.

actor.syntax:
actor( String modelname, [ String keyname1 ], [ String value1 ], [ String keyname2 ],
[ String value2 ], [ String keyname3 ], [ String value3 ], [ String keyname4 ], [ String value4 ] )
actor.description: Spawns an actor in front of the player.

actorinfo.description: Prints info on the specified actor.

add.description:
Add a new point to the camera path where the player is standing.
Used in the "camera" menu.

additionalstartammo.description: Gives some additional start ammo of the specified type.

addkills.description: Give or take kills from the player.

addmusictrigger.description:
Add a new music trigger where the player is standing.
Used in the "zound" menu.

addobjective.syntax: addobjective( Integer objective_number, Integer status, [ String text ], [ Vector location ] )
addobjective.description: Adds/Changes an Objective. The status value can be one of the following: 1 = Don't draw 2 = In progress 3 = Completed

addownervelocity.description: Set whether or not the owner's velocity is added to the projectile's velocity.

addrandomspeaker.description:
Add a new sound where the player is standing.
Used in the "zound" menu.

addreverbtrigger.description:
Add a new reverb trigger where the player is standing.
Used in the "zound" menu.

addspeaker.description:
Add a new sound where the player is standing.
Used in the "zound" menu.

addvelocity.syntax: addvelocity( Float velocity_x, Float velocity_y, Float velocity_z )
addvelocity.description: Set a velocity to be added to the projectile when it is created.

ai_event.description:
Let the AI know that this entity made a sound.
'type' is a string specifying what type of sound it is.
'radius' determines how far the sound reaches.

ai_off.description: Turns the AI off for this actor.

ai_on.description: Turns the AI on for this actor.

ai_visiondistance.description: Sets the default AI Vision Distance.

aibulletspread.description: Set the spread of the bullets in the X and Y axis.

aimat.description:
Specify the target to aim at.
'target' can be anything which has an origin.

aimtarget.example:
local.strafing_gunfire = spawn script_aimedstrafinggunfire
local.strafing_gunfire aimtarget local.target

aimtolerance.description: Sets a tolerance for the angles.

airange.description: Set the range of this gun for the AI: short, medium, long, sniper.

alarm.description:
Sets/Gets the global level alarm.
zero = global level alarm off.
non-zero = alarm on.
alarm.example:
level.alarm = 1 // alarm on
println level.alarm // Prints: 1

alarmnode.description: Sets/Gets the name of the alarm node for the actor (must have type set to alarm for effect).
alarmnode.example:
local.actor alarmnode "runwayspot"
// Or
local.actor.alarmnode = "runwayspot"
local.alarmnode = local.actor.alarmnode

alarmthread.description: Sets/Gets the name of the alarm thread for the actor (must have type set to alarm for effect).
alarmthread.example:
local.actor alarmthread "ai_alarm_fired"
// Or
local.actor.alarmthread = "ai_alarm_fired"
local.alarmthread = local.actor.alarmthread

alias.syntax:
alias( String alias, String realPath, [ String arg1 ], [ String arg2 ],
[ String arg3 ], [ String arg4 ], [ String arg5 ], [ String arg6 ] )
alias.description: Create an alias to the specified path.

aliascache.syntax:
aliascache( String alias, String realPath, [ String arg1 ], [ String arg2 ], [ String arg3 ], [ String arg4 ],
[ String arg5 ], [ String arg6 ] )
aliascache.description: Create an alias to the specified path and cache the resource.
aliascache.example:
local.master = spawn "ScriptMaster"
local.master aliascache "headshot" "sound/headshot.wav" soundparms 1.2 0.0 1.0 0.0 300 1000 voice loaded maps "m dm obj"

alliesobjnum.description: Sets the objective number for the allies team.

alpha.description:
Set the alpha of the entity to newAlpha.
NOTE: In order to use this command, the entity's shader must have the 'alphaGen entity' statement in it.

altcurrent.description: Sets the alternate current mood to use when triggered.

altfallback.description: Sets the alternate fallback mood to use when triggered.

altreverblevel.description: Sets the reverb level to be used when triggered.

alwaysaway.description: Makes the door always open away from the person opening it.

alwaysdraw.description: Sets this entity to always draw.

ammo.description:
Gives the sentient some ammo.
'type' can be: pistol, rifle, smg, mg, grenade, agrenade, heavy or shotgun.

ammo_grenade.description:
Gives the AI some grenades.
or
Returns how many grenades an AI has.
ammo_grenade.example:
local.actor ammo_grenade 3
// Or
local.actor.ammo_grenade = 3
local.ammo_grenade = local.actor.ammo_grenade

ammo_in_clip.description: Set the amount of ammo in the clip.

ammopickupsound.description: Sets the weapon's ammo pickup sound alias.

ammorequired.description: Set the amount of ammo this weapon requires to fire.

ammotype.description: Set the type of ammo this weapon uses.

amount.description: Sets the amount of the item.

angle.description:
Sets/Gets the angles of the entity using just one value.
Sets/Gets the yaw of the entity or an up and down direction if 'newAngle' is [0-359] or -1 or -2
angle.example:
local.entity angle 90
// Or
local.entity.angle = 90

println local.entity.angle // Prints: 90.000

angles.description: Sets/Gets the angles of the entity.
angles.example:
local.entity angles ( 0 90 0 )
// Or
local.entity.angles = ( 0 90 0 )

println local.entity.angles // Prints: (0.000000, 90.000000, 0.000000)

angles_pointat.syntax: angles_pointat( Entity parent_entity, Entity entity, Entity target_entity )
angles_pointat.description:
Returns the angles that points at the target_entity given
the base orientation of the parent_entity and the position of the entity.

angles_toforward.description: Returns the forward vector of the specified angles.

angles_toleft.description: Returns the left vector of the specified angles.

angles_toup.description: Returns the up vector of the specified angles.

anim_noclip.description:
Play noclip animation.

NOTE: anim_noclip will translate the origin but will not hold onto rotations made in the animation.
Thus, anims using anim_noclip need to start and end with the same set of angles.

animated_farplane.syntax: animated_farplane( Float farplaneStart, Float farplaneEnd, Float ZStart, Float ZEnd )
animated_farplane.description: Set the distance of the far clipping plane based on a farplane range and a Z range.

animated_farplane_bias.syntax: animated_farplane_bias( Float biasStart, Float biasEnd, Float ZStart, Float ZEnd )
animated_farplane_bias.description: Set the bias of the far clipping plane based on a bias range and a Z range.

animated_farplane_color.syntax: animated_farplane_color( Vector colorStart, Vector colorEnd, Float ZStart, Float ZEnd )
animated_farplane_color.description: Set the color of the far clipping plane based on a color range and a Z range.

animationset.description: Sets the Animation Set to use.

animfinal.description: Whether the animation was succesfully finished.

animloop_legs.description: Called when the legs animation has finished.

animloop_pain.description: Called when the pain animation has finished.

animloop_torso.description: Called when the torso animation has finished.

animscript_attached.description: Play a noclip animation even when attached.

arc.description: arc in front of the player

arctotarget.description: Make the projectile follow a normal arc on its way to its target.

arena.description: Set the arena number for this starting position.

armwithweapons.description: Give player their primary and secondary weapons.

atan.description: Reborn: Returns the principal value of the arc tangent of y/x, expressed in radians. Breakthrough: ArcTangent of float (in degrees, not radians).

attach.syntax: attach( Entity parent, String tagname, [ Integer use_angles ] )
attach.description: Attach this entity to the parent's legs tag called tagname.

attachdriverslot.description: Attaches an entity to the specified slot.

attachedmodelanim.syntax: attachedmodelanim( String tagname, String anim_name, Float crossblend_time, String model_name )
attachedmodelanim.description:
Tells models (or specified model) attached to specified tag to play specified animation.
Crossblend time doesn't work yet.

attachgrenade.description: Used only by grenade return animations to tell the code when to attach the grenade to the actor.

attachmodel.syntax:
attachmodel( String modelname, String tagname, [ Float scale ], [ String targetname ], [ Boolean detach_at_death ],
[ Float removetime ], [ Float fadeintime ], [ Float fadeoutdelay ], [ Float fadetime ], [ Vector offset ] )
attachmodel.description:
Attach a entity with modelname to this entity to tag called tagname.
scale - scale of attached entities.
targetname - targetname for attached entities.
detach_at_death - when entity dies, should this model be detached.
removetime - when the entity should be removed, if not specified, never.
fadeintime - time to fade the model in over.
fadeoutdelay - time to wait until we fade the attached model out.
fadeoutspeed - time the model fades out over.
offset - vector offset for the model from the specified tag.

attachpassengerslot.description: Attaches an entity to the specified slot.

attachtohand.description: Attaches an active weapon to the specified hand.

attachtoladder.description: Attaches the sentient to a ladder.

attachturretslot.description: Attaches an entity to the specified slot.

attackhandler.description: Sets/Gets the current script that will handle attack events.

attackmode.description: Sets the attackmode for this spawn entity.

attackplayer.description: Force Actor to attack the player.

auto_active.description: Whether or not the auto camera is active.

auto_join_team.description: Join the team with fewer players.

auto_maxfov.description: Sets the maximum FOV that should be used when automatically calculating FOV.

auto_radius.description: Sets the radius of the automatic camera. (default 512).

auto_starttime.description: Sets how long it takes for the camera to be switched to. (default 0.2).

auto_state.syntax: auto_state( String state1, [ String state2 ], [ String state3 ], [ String state4 ], [ String state5 ], [ String state6 ] )
auto_state.description:
Sets the states the player needs to be in for this camera to activate.
Any number of states can be specified and only the first few letters need be specified as well.
A state of 'pipe' would mean that any player state that started with 'pipe' would trigger this camera.

auto_stoptime.description: Sets how long it takes for the camera switch back to the player. (default 0.2).

autoaim.description: Turn on auto aiming for the weapon

autoputaway.description: Set the weapon to be automatically put away when out of ammo.

avelocity.syntax:
avelocity( [ String [random|crandom] ], [ Float yaw ], [ String [random|crandom] ],
[ Float pitch ], [ String [random|crandom] ], [ Float roll ] )
avelocity.description: Entity: Gets the angular velocity for this entity. Projectile: Set the angular velocity of the projectile.

avoidplayer.description:
Set to 0 if this AI shouldn't automatically get out of the way,
non-zero if he should.

axisobjnum.description: Sets the objective number for the axis team.

back_mass.description: Sets the mass of the back of the vehicle.

badplace.syntax: badplace( String name, Vector origin, Float radius, [ String team ], [ Float duration ] )
badplace.description: Enables a 'bad place' for AI of team "american", "german", or (default) "both" to avoid, and optionally gives it a duration.

balconyheight.description: Sets/Gets the minimum height a balcony guy must fall to do special balcony death.
balconyheight.example:
local.actor balconyheight 150.0
// Or
local.actor.balconyheight = 150.0
local.balconyheight = local.actor.balconyheight

barreltype.description:
Sets the barrel's type.
Valid settings are: "water", "oil", "gas" and "empty"

beam.syntax: beam( String command, [ String arg1 ], [ String arg2 ], [ String arg3 ], [ String arg4 ], [ String arg5 ], [ String arg6 ] )
beam.description: Send a (FuncBeam) command to the beam of this projectile.
beam.example:
local.projectile beam color "1 0 0"
local.projectile beam maxoffset 0.0

becomebomb.description: Make the projectile into a bomb.

bedead.description: Forces the actor to be instantly and totally dead no death animation is played.

bind.description: Bind this entity to the specified entity.

blendtime.description:
Sets the crossblend time to something other than the default, in seconds.
Get the crossblend time.

blockend.description: Is the end of the sentient's block.

blockstart.description: Is the start of the sentient's block.

bloodmodel.description: Set the model to be used when showing blood.

bombs_planted.description: Sets/Gets the number of bombs that are set.

bouncebackwardsvelocity.description:
For vehicles on rails that are moving backwards, reverse our velocity.
(Optionally pass bStayFullSpeed to keep vehicle at full speed after the bounce).

bouncefactor.description: Sets how far smoke volumes bounce when they collide with something.

bounceforwardsvelocity.description: For vehicles on rails that are moving forwards, reverse our velocity.

bouncesound.description: When bouncing, what sound to play on impact.

bouncesound_hard.description: Set the name of the sound that is played when the projectile bounces off hard surfaces.

bouncesound_metal.description: Set the name of the sound that is played when the projectile bounces off metal.

bouncesound_water.description: Set the name of the sound that is played when the projectile bounces in water.

bouncesoundchance.description: When bouncing, the chance that the bounce sound will be played.

bouncetouch.description: Make the projectile bounce when it hits a non-damageable solid.

breakspecial.description: Tell AI to break special attack.

bsptransition.description:
Transitions to the next BSP. Keeps player data, and game data.
'skipFade' is valid on Breakthrough only

bulletcount.description: Set the number of bullets this weapon shoots when fired.

bulletdamage.description: Set the damage that the bullet causes.

bulletknockback.description: Set the knockback that the bullet causes.

bulletlarge.description: Set if the bullets fired are rifle bullets(1), artillery(2) or larger tracers(3).

bulletrange.description: Set the range of the bullets.

bulletspread.syntax: bulletspread( Float bulletSpreadX, Float bulletSpreadY, [ Float bulletSpreadXmax ], [ Float bulletSpreadYmax ] )
bulletspread.description: Set the min & optional max spread of the bullet in the x and y axis.

burstfiresettings.syntax: burstFireSettings( Float mintime, Float maxtime, Float mindelay, Float maxdelay )
burstfiresettings.description: Sets the settings for burst mode firing.

calcgrenadetoss.description:
Called to calculate a grenade toss. Must be called before a grenade throwing animation.
Returns the name of the script to call with animscript if the toss can succeed, or if the toss won't work.
Should be called infrequently, and never during the middle of a grenade toss.

calcgrenadetoss2.description:
Called to calculate a grenade toss. Must be called before a grenade throwing animation.
Returns the name of the script to call with animscript if the toss can succeed, or if the toss won't work.
Should be called infrequently, and never during the middle of a grenade toss.
The speed parameter is optional. Pass a speed if you just want to override and throw no matter what...

cam.syntax: cam( String command, [ String arg1 ], [ String arg2 ], [ String arg3 ], [ String arg4 ], [ String arg5 ], [ String arg6 ] )

camera.description:
Set the camera to use when in this animation.
topdown, behind, front, side, behind_fixed, side_left, side_right.

camera_think.description: Called each frame to allow the camera to adjust its position.

cancelfor.description: Cancel for event of type name.

canhitowner.description: Make the projectile be able to hit its owner.

canjump.description: Sets whether or not the vehicle can jump.

canmoveto.description: Returns a boolean if the AI can move to a point for use in anim scripts.

cansee.syntax: cansee( Entity entity, [ Float fov ], [ Float vision_distance ] )
cansee.description: Returns 1 if the entities can see eachother, 0 if not.

canseenoents.syntax: canseenoents( Entity entity, [ Float fov ], [ Float vision_distance ] )
canseenoents.description: Returns 1 if the entities can see eachother, 0 if not ignores any entities between them.

canshoot.description: Determines if it would be possible to shoot the sentient's enemy from the given position.

canshootenemyfrom.description: Determines if it would be possible to shoot the sentient's enemy from the given position.

cantpartialreload.description: Prevents the weapon from being reloaded part way through a clip.

canuse.description: Returns 1 if passed entity can 'use' this vehicle.

censor.description: Used to ban certain contact when in parentmode.

centerprint.description:
Prints the included message in the middle of all player's screens.

NOTE: this command seems to be broken. Use it like in the example.

chance.description:
RandomSpeaker: Sets the chance that the sound will play when triggered.
RunThrough: Sets the chance that the trigger will spawn something.

channel.description: Sets the sound channel to play on.

charge.description: Starts the charging of the weapon in the specified hand.

chargelife.description: Set the projectile's life to be determined by the charge time.

chargespeed.description: Set the projectile's speed to be determined by the charge time.

checkanims.description: Check the animations in the .tik file versus the statefile. Unused Animations in TIKI, and Unknown Animations in Statefile will be printed to the console.

checkonground.description: Check if exploding wall is on ground.

classname.description:
Determines what class to use for this entity (TIKI files).
This is pre-processed from the BSP at the start of the level.

Gets the entity's classname.

claypidgeon.description: Turn the entity into a non-solid shootable thing.

clear_objective_pos.description: Clears the position of the current objective, for when you don't have one.

clearfade.description: Clear the fade (fadein, fadeout) from the screen.

clearowner.description: Make the projectile be able to hit its owner now.

clip_add.description: Add to the weapons ammo clip with ammo from its owner.

clip_empty.description: Empties the weapon's clip of ammo, returning it to the owner.

clip_fill.description: Fills the weapons ammo clip with ammo from its owner.

clipsize.description: Set the amount of rounds a clip of the weapon holds.

clockside.description:
Sets/Gets which side the clock is on...
"axis" or "allies" win when time is up,
"kills" gives the win to the team with more live members,
"draw" no one wins.
clockside.example:
level clockside "axis"
// Or
level.clockside = "axis"
println level.clockside // Prints: "axis"

closeportal.description: Close the area portal enclosed in this object.

cnt.description: Set the amount of times this trigger can be triggered.

collisionent.description: Sets/Gets the Collision Entity (script model of collision hull)

color.description:
Set the color of the beam.
Color values are set in a scale from 0.0 to 1.0.

commanddelay.syntax:
commanddelay( Float delay, String command, [ String [arg1] ], [ String [arg2] ], [ String [arg3] ],
[ String [arg4] ], [ String [arg5] ], [ String [arg6] ] ), [ â€¦ ]
commanddelay.description: Executes a command after the given delay.

cone.description: Sets the cone in which directed triggers will trigger.

connect_paths.description: Connects all navigation paths which intersect with the specified entity's volume.

constantdamage.description: Makes the explosion do constant damage over the radius.

continue.description: ScriptThread: The continue statement is used inside loops. When a continue statement is encountered inside a loop, control jumps to the beginning of the loop for next iteration, skipping the execution of statements inside the body of loop for the current iteration. Camera: Continue the camera movement.

controlledby.description:
Sets the team controlling the objective.

NOTE: For objective function calls 'ControlledBy', 'TakeOver' and 'SetCurrent', the teams are as such:
0 = Axis
1 = Allies
2 = Neutral

coord.description: Prints out current location and angles.

correctweaponattachments.description: Makes sure the weapon is properly attached when interupting a reload.

cos.description: Reborn: Returns the cosine of an angle of x radians. Breakthrough: Cosine of float (expects degrees not radians).

count.description:
UseAnim: Sets how many times the UseAnim can be triggered.
UseObject: Sets how many times the UseObject can be triggered.

crawlto.description: Specify the location to crawl to.

crosshair.description: Turn on/off the crosshair for this weapon.

crouchto.description: Specify the location to crouch to.

cuecamera.description:
Cue the camera.
If switchTime is specified, then the camera will switch over that length of time.

cueplayer.description:
Go back to the normal camera.
If switchTime is specified, then the camera will switch over that length of time.

curiousoff.description: Turn off an actor's curious state.

curiouson.description: Turn on an actor's curious state.

current.description: Sets the current mood to use when triggered.

cut.description: Switch camera states immediately, do not transition.

damage.syntax:
damage( Entity attacker, Integer damage, Entity inflictor, Vector position, Vector direction,
Vector normal, Integer knockback, Integer damageflags, Integer meansofdeath, Integer location )
damage.description: General damage event used by all entities.

damage_type.description: Sets what kind of damage is needed to activate the trigger.

damageable.description: Makes the trigger able to take damage, but it is up to the script to watch this damage.

damageagain.description: This event is generated each frame if explosion is set to damage each frame.

damageeveryframe.description: Makes the explosion damage every frame.

damagemult.description: Sets the damage multiplier for a particular body location.

damagepuff.description: Spawns a puff of 'blood' smoke at the speficied location in the specified direction.

damagesounds.description: Makes the vehicle play damaged sounds.

damagetype.description: Sets the type of damage a TriggerHurt delivers.

dampening.description:
Fulcrum: Dampening of Fulcrum.
SinkObject: Dampening of SinkObject.

deactivate.description:
FuncBeam: Deactivate the beam.
UseObject: Do not allow the useobject to be used.

deactivateweapon.description: Deactivate the weapon in the specified hand.

dead.description: Called when the player is dead.

deathembalm.description: Preps the dead actor for turning nonsolid gradually over time.

deathhandler.description: Sets/Gets the current script that will handle death events.

deathsinkeachframe.description: Makes the entity sink into the ground and then get removed (this gets called each frame).

deathsinkstart.description: Makes the entity sink into the ground and then get removed (this starts it).

debrismodel.description: What kind of debris to spawn when triggered.

debristype.description:
Sets the debris type of the crate/window. (Default is 0).

Window debristype:
0: clear glass Window.
1: colored glass Window.

Crate debristype:
0: wooden crate 32 units to a side.
1: wooden crate 64 units to a side.
2: cardboard crate 16 units to a side.
3: cardboard crate 32 units to a side.

debugline.syntax: debugline( Vector start, Vector end, [ Float red ], [ Float green ], [ Float blue ], [ Float alpha ] )
debugline.description: Draws a debug line from start to end using the given color and alpha for g_numdebuglinedelays server frames.

delay.description:
FuncBeam: Set the amount of delay on the beam updater.
RunThrough: Time between RunThrough being activated.
SinkObject: Delay until SinkObject starts falling.
Trigger: Set the delay time (time between triggering and firing) for this trigger.

detach.description: Detach this entity from its parent.

detachallchildren.description: Detach all the children from the entity.

detachdriverslot.description: Detaches an entity to the specified slot.

detachgrenade.description: Used only by grenade return animations to tell the code when to throw the grenade.

detachpassengerslot.description: Detaches an entity to the specified slot.

detachturretslot.description: Detaches an entity to the specified slot.

dieinwater.description: Make the projectile die when gets wet.

disconnect_paths.description: Disconnects all navigation paths which intersect with the specified entity's volume.

disguise_accept_thread.description: Sets/Gets the name of the thread for the actor to start when accepting papers.
disguise_accept_thread.example:
local.actor disguise_accept_thread "label"
// Or
local.actor.disguise_accept_thread = "label"
local.get_thread = local.actor.disguise_accept_thread

disguise_level.description:
Sets/Gets the disguise level of the actor.
May be 1 or 2.
disguise_level.example:
local.actor disguise_level 1
// Or
local.actor.disguise_level = 1
local.disguise_level = local.actor.disguise_level

disguise_period.description: Sets/Gets the time between the end of one disguise behavior and start of the next.
disguise_period.example:
local.actor disguise_period 30
// Or
local.actor.disguise_period = 30
local.period = local.actor.disguise_period

disguise_range.description: Sets/Gets the maximum distance for disguise behavior to get triggered.
disguise_range.example:
local.actor disguise_range 1000
// Or
local.actor.disguise_range = 1000
local.range = local.actor.disguise_range

distancetoenemy.description: Get the distance from the Actor to its enemy.

dlight.syntax: dlight( Float red, Float green, Float blue, Float intensity )
dlight.description: Set the color and intensity of the dynamic light on the projectile.

dm.description: Makes a command be executed only in multiplayer.

dmammorequired.description: Set the amount of ammo this weapon requires to fire for multiplayer.

dmamount.description: Sets the amount of the item for multiplayer.

dmbulletcount.description: Set the number of bullets this weapon shoots when fired for multiplayer.

dmbulletdamage.description: Set the damage that the bullet causes for multiplayer.

dmbulletrange.description: Set the range of the bullets for multiplayer.

dmbulletspread.syntax: dmbulletspread( Float bulletSpreadX, Float bulletSpreadY, [ Float bulletSpreadXmax ], [ Float bulletSpreadYmax ] )
dmbulletspread.description: Set the min & optional max spread of the bullet in the x and y axis for multiplayer.

dmcantpartialreload.description: Prevents the weapon from being reloaded part way through a clip for multiplayer.

dmcrosshair.description: Turn on/off the crosshair for this weapon for multiplayer.

dmdeathdrop.description: Drops the player inventory in DM after's he's been killed.

dmfiredelay.description: Set the minimum time between shots from the weapon for multiplayer.

dmfirespreadmult.syntax: dmfirespreadmult( Float scaleadd, Float falloff, Float cap, Float maxtime )
dmfirespreadmult.description: Sets a time decayed multiplyer to spread when the weapon is fired for multiplayer.

dmg.description:
Door: Sets the amount of damage the door will do to entities that get stuck in it.
Exploder: Sets the damage the explosion does.
ExplodingWall: Sets the damage from the exploding wall.
FallingRock: Sets the damage from the rock.
MultiExploder: Sets the damage the explosion does.
PushObject: Set the damage.
ScriptSlave: Set the damage.

dmlife.description: Set the life of the projectile in multiplayer.

dmmaxamount.description: Sets the max amount of the item for multiplayer.

dmmessage.description:
Sends a multiplayer message to the appropriate players.

Modes:
-1 = Team chat ('sayteam' command).
 0 = Global chat ('say' command)
 1 = Private chat ('sayprivate', 'sayone' command).

dmmovementspeed.description: Alters the movement speed of the player when he has the weapon out for multiplayer.

dmprojectile.description: Set the model of the projectile that this weapon fires in multiplayer.

dmrealism.description: Makes a command be executed only in miltiplayer realism mode.

dmrespawning.description:
Set to 1 to turn on wave-based DM, to 0 to disable respawns within a round.
Returns 1 if wave-based DM, 0 if respawns are disabled within a round.
dmrespawning.example:
level dmrespawning 0
// Or
level.dmrespawning = 0
println level.dmrespawning // Prints: 0

dmroundlimit.description:
Sets the default roundlimit, in minutes; can be overridden by 'roundlimit' cvar.
Gets the actual roundlimit, in minutes; may be 'roundlimit' cvar or the default round limit.
dmroundlimit.example:

// Or
level.dmroundlimit = 6
println level.dmroundlimit // Prints: 6

dmstartammo.description: Set the starting ammo of this weapon for multiplayer.

dmzoomspreadmult.description: Sets the spread multiplier for when using the zoom on a zooming weapon for multiplayer.

doactivate.description: General trigger event for all entities.

dog.description: Sets the god mode cheat or toggles it.

donedeath.description: Makes the view jitter only happen once.

donefiring.description: Signals the end of the fire animation.

donereloading.description: Signals the end of the reload animation.

dontdropweapons.description: Sentient: Make the sentient not drop weapons. AISpawnPoint: dontdropweapons getter.

door_triggerfield.description: Is called when a doors trigger field is touched.

doorclosed.description: Called when the door finishes closing.

dooropened.description: Called when the door finishes opening.

doortype.description:
Sets the defaults for this door.

Door types:
"wood" (default).
"metal".

doroundtransition.description: Delayed function call to (possibly) determine round winner and restart next round.

dotouch.description:
Sent to entity when touched.

Classes:
DrivableVehicle, Emitter, ExplodingWall, FallingRock, Fulcrum, Gib, Projectile, PuffDaddy, RunThrough, ScriptSlave,
SinkObject, ThrowObject, TossObject, Trigger, TriggerAll, TriggerHurt, TriggerNoDamage, UseAnim, Vehicle.

douse.description:
Sent to entity when it is used by another entity.

Classes:
Door, Item, ScriptSlave, ThrobbingBox_Explosive, ThrobbingBox_Stickybomb,
TriggerCameraUse, TriggerUse, TurretGun, Vehicle, VehicleTurretGun

dprintln.syntax: dprintln( String string, [ String string ], [ String string ], â€¦ )
dprintln.description: Prints a debug string, followed by a newline.

drawhud.description:
Specfiy if hud is to be drawn:

0 = draws nothing.
1 = draws all.
2 = draws all minus the weapons bar.

drive.syntax: drive( Vector position, Float speed, Float acceleration, Float reach_distance, Float look_ahead, [ Vector alternate_position ] )
drive.description: Makes the vehicle drive to position with speed and acceleration until reached_distance close to position.

drivenowait.syntax: driveNoWait( Vector position, Float speed, Float acceleration, Float reach_distance, Float look_ahead )
drivenowait.description:
Makes the vehicle drive to position with speed and acceleration until reached_distance close to position.
thread doesn't wait.

droptofloor.description:
Drops the entity to the ground.
if maxRange is not specified, 8192 is used.

dropturret.description: Makes the carryable turret have itself dropped.

duckableglue.description: Glue this entity to the specified entity, but allow ducking.

duration.description:
MultiExploder: Sets the duration of the explosion.
ViewJitter: Sets the length of time it should last. 0 will be instantanious.

earthquake.syntax: earthquake( Float duration, Float magnitude, Float no_rampup, Float no_rampdown )

edgeeffect.description: Sets the fraction of the jitter to apply at the max radius.

edgetriggered.description: If true, trigger will only trigger when object enters trigger, not when it is inside it.

effects.syntax:
effects( [ String parameter1 ], [ String parameter2 ], [ String parameter3 ],
[ String parameter4 ], [ String parameter5 ], [ String parameter6 ] )
effects.description:
Change the current entity effects flags.

Valid flags are as follows:
+ sets a flag
- clears a flag
antisbjuice = anti sucknblow juice.
everyframe = process commands every time entity is rendered.

emotion.description: The method of setting the facial expression of the Actor.

endactionanim.description: End any aiming/action animation which is currently playing.

endalpha.description: Set the endpoint alpha value of the beam.

endlevel.description: Called when the player gets to the end of the level.

endpoint.description: Set the end point of the beam. The beam will be draw from the origin to the end point.

enemy_visible_change_time.description: Get the last time whether or not the enemy is visible changed, in seconds.

enemyname.description: Use the enemyname parameter for the AI that is being spawned in to set its targetname.

enemysharerange.description: Sets/Gets the range outside which the AI will not receive notification that a teammate has a new enemy.
enemysharerange.example:
local.actor enemysharerange 1500
// Or
local.actor.enemysharerange = 1500
local.enemysharerange = local.actor.enemysharerange

ensureforwardoffladder.description: Ensures that the player went forward off the ladder.

ensureoverladder.description: Ensures that the player is at the proper height when getting off the top of a ladder.

enter.description: Called when someone gets into a vehicle.

error.description:
Generate a script error with specified message and stack level.
The game will shutdown.

exit.description: Called when driver gets out of the vehicle.

explode.description:
Projectile: Make the projectile explode.
ScriptSlave: Creates an explosion at the script slave's position.
ThrobbingBox_Explosive: Cause the explosion to happen.
explode.example:
local.projectile explode
local.script_object explode 500
local.throbbing_box explode

explodeontouch.description: Make the projectile explode when it touches something damagable.

explosionattack.description: Spawn an explosion optionally from a specific tag.

explosioneffect.description:
Explosion: Make an explosionType explosion effect.
ThrobbingBox_Explosive: Set the explosion effect model.

explosionmodel.description:
Projectile: Set the modelName of the explosion to be spawned.
Vehicle: Sets the TIKI to call when the vehicle dies.

eyeslookat.description: The actor will look at this entity.

fade.description:
Fade the entity's alpha, reducing it by 0.03 every FRAMETIME, until it has faded out.
This command does not remove the entity (unlike 'fadeout').

NOTE: In order to use this command, the entity's shader must have the 'alphaGen entity' statement in it.

fadedelay.description: Sets how long the entity waits until fading out from 1 alpha to 0 alpha, in seconds.

fadein.description: Entity: fadein( [ Float fadetime[0.00...max_float] ], [ Float target_alpha[0.00...1.00] ] ) Fade the entity's alpha and scale in, increasing it by 0.03 every FRAMETIME, until it has faded completely in to 1.0. If fadetime or target_alpha are defined, they will override the default values. NOTE: In order to use this command, the entity's shader must have the 'alphaGen entity' statement in it. ScriptThread: fadein( Float time, Float red, Float green, Float blue, Float alpha, [ Integer mode ] ) Sets up fadein in values. SmokeGrenade: fadein( Float time ) Sets fadein time from 0 alpha to 1 alpha, in seconds.

fadeout.description: Entity: fadeout( [ Float fadetime[0.00...max_float] ], [ Float alpha[0.00...1.00] ] ) Fade the entity's alpha and scale out, reducing it by 0.03 every FRAMETIME, until it has faded out. If fadetime or target_alpha are defined, they will override the defaults. Once the entity has been completely faded, the entity is removed. NOTE: In order to use this command, the entity's shader must have the 'alphaGen entity' statement in it. ScriptThread: fadeout( Float time, Float red, Float green, Float blue, Float alpha, [ Integer mode ] ) Sets up fadeout values.

fadesound.description: Fades the sound out over the given time.

fadetime.description:
Camera: Sets the fade time for camera transitioning.
SplinePath: Sets the fadetime at this node.

fakebullets.description: Whether or not the projectile generator should fire real bullets.

fallback.description: Sets the fallback mood to use when triggered.

fallheight.example:
local.actor fallheight 200
// Or
local.actor.fallheight = 200
local.fallheight = local.actor.fallheight

fallingangleadjust.description: Adjusts the weapons angles as it falls to the ground.

farclipoverride.description: Override the min config default for the far clip distance.

farplane.description: Sets/Gets the distance of the far clipping plane.

farplane_bias.description: Sets/Gets the distance bias of the far clipping plane.

farplane_color.description: Sets/Gets the color of the far clipping plane fog.

farplane_cull.description:
Whether or not the far clipping plane should cull things out of the world.

0 - no cull
1 - normal cull
2 - cull but no bsp culling (SH & BT only)

farplaneclipcolor.description: Override the fog color for the min config.

favoriteenemy.example:
local.actor favoriteenemy local.enemy
// Or
local.actor.favoriteenemy = local.enemy
local.enemy = local.actor.favoriteenemy

findendpoint.description: Find the endpoint of a beam.

findenemy.description: Finds the best enemy to target.

finishroundtransition.description: Delayed function call to do the actual restart for the next round.

finishuseanim.description: Fires off all targets associated with a particular useanim.

finishuseobject.description: Fires off all targets associated with a particular useobject.

fire.description:
Sentient: Fires the weapon in the specified hand.
ScriptAimedStrafingGunfire (SH & BT only): Fire.
ScriptSimpleStrafingGunfire (SH & BT only): Fire.

fire_grenade.description: Used only by grenade throw animations to tell the code when to throw a grenade.

firedelay.description: Set the minimum time between shots from the weapon.

fireheld.description: Returns 1 if this player is holding fire, or 0 if he is not.

fireonstartup.description:
Default = 1
Set this to 0 if you don't want the ProjectileGenerator to fire on startup.

firespreadmult.syntax: firespreadmult( Float scaleadd, Float falloff, Float cap, Float maxtime )
firespreadmult.description: Sets a time decayed multiplier to spread when the weapon is fired.

firetype.description: Set the firing type of the weapon (projectile or bullet).

firewarmupdelay.description: Set the warmup delay before use after mounting the weapon.

fixedleash.description:
If non-zero, the leash will never auto-reset.
If zero, the leash may auto-reset.
fixedleash.example:
local.actor fixedleash 1
// Or
local.actor.fixedleash = 1
local.result = local.actor.fixedleash

flags.syntax:
flags( [ String parameter1 ], [ String parameter2 ], [ String parameter3 ],
[ String parameter4 ], [ String parameter5 ], [ String parameter6 ] )
flags.description:
Change the current entity flags.

Valid flags are as follows:
+ sets a flag.
- clears a flag.
blood - should it bleed.
explode - should it explode when dead.
die_gibs - should it spawn gibs when dead.
god - makes the entity invincible.

flash.syntax: flash( Float time, Float r, Float g, Float b, Float radius )

flypath.syntax: flypath( Entity array, Float speed, Float acceleration, Float look_ahead )
flypath.description: Makes the script slave fly the specified path with speed and acceleration until reached_distance close to position.

follow.description: Makes the camera follow an entity and optionally watch an entity.

follow_yaw.description: Sets the yaw offset of the camera following an entity.

follow_yaw_absolute.description: Makes the follow camera yaw absolute.

follow_yaw_relative.description: Makes the follow camera yaw relative (not absolute).

followpath.syntax:
followpath( Entity path, [ String arg1 ], [ String arg2 ], [ String arg3 ],
[ String arg4 ], [ String arg5 ], [ String arg6 ] )
followpath.description:
Makes the script slave follow the specified path.
The allowable arguments are:
ignoreangles, ignorevelocity, normalangles, loop, and a number specifying the start time.

forceactivate.description: Forces an entity to activate outside of the player's PVS.

forcedrophealth.description: Force the sentient to drop health no matter what level.nodrophealth is.

forcedropweapon.description: Force the sentient to drop weapons no matter what level.nodropweapon is.

forcelandminemeasure.description:
Force a remeasurement to all landmines.
Used on MineDetector.

forcelegsstate.description: Force the player's legs to a certain state.

forcemusic.description: Forces the current and fallback (optional) music moods.

forcetorsostate.description: Force the player's torso to a certain state.

forwardvector.description: Get the forward vector of angles.

fov.description:
Actor, AISpawnPoint: Gets/Sets the Field of View angle of the actor.

Camera: fov( Float fov, [ Float fadeTime ] )
Sets the camera's field of view (fov).
if fadeTime is specified, camera will fade over that time
if fov is less than 3, than an auto_fov will be assumed
the value of fov will be the ratio used for keeping a watch
entity in the view at the right scale.

Player: Sets the player's fov.

SplinePath: Sets the fov at this node.

freezeplayer.description:
Freeze all the players.
Use 'releaseplayer' to release the players.

front_mass.description: Sets the mass of the front of the vehicle.

fullstop.description: Make the Vehicle Stop Moving... Completely!

fuse.description: Set the projectile's life to be determined by the charge time.

getboundkey1.description: Return a string describing the key.

getboundkey2.description: Return a string describing the key.

getcontrollerangles.description: Gets the control angles for the specified bone.

getcurrentdmweapontype.description: Get the player's current DM weapon type.

getlocalyawfromvector.description: Turn a worldspace vector into a local space yaw.

getmaxs.description: Get the maxs of the bounding box of the entity to maxs.

getmins.description: Get the mins of the bounding box of the entity to mins.

getmovement.description:
Returns the player current movement.
Can return: "standing", "running", "walking" or "falling".

getposition.description:
Returns the player current position.
Can return: "standing", "crouching", or "offground".

gettagangles.description: Gets the world angles of the tag.

gettagposition.description: Gets the world position of the tag.

gettargetentity.description: Returns entity being targeted by the projectile generator.

ghost.description: Make non-solid but still send to client regardless of hide status.

give.description:
Player: Gives the player the specified thing (weapon, ammo, item, etc.) and optionally the amount.
Sentient: Gives the sentient the targeted item.

givedynitem.description: Pass the args to the item.

giveweapon.description: Gives the player the specified weapon.

globaltranslate.description: Translates all sounds and triggers by specified amount.

glue.description: Glue this entity to the specified entity.

gotkill.syntax: gotkill( Entity victim, Integer damage, Entity inflictor, Integer meansofdeath, Boolean gib )
gotkill.description: Event sent to attacker when an entity dies.

goto.description:
Transfers script flow to the specified label.
Can be used to escape deeply nested loops, or handling errors.

gravity.description:
Entity: Change the gravity on this entity.
World: Set the gravity for the whole world.

gren_awareness.description:
Sets/Gets the awareness of grenades in 0-100 percent chance of responding
to a grenadewhen the AI sees it (applied once every 0.4 seconds)
gren_awareness.example:
local.actor gren_awareness 0
// Or
local.actor.gren_awareness = 0
local.percent = local.actor.gren_awareness

gun.description:
Specifies the gun to use.
Gets the gun to being used.
gun.example:
local.actor gun "KAR98sniper"
// Or
local.actor.gun = "KAR98sniper"
local.gun = local.actor.gun

gvo.description: Retrieves the server's vote options file.

has_disguise.description:
Sets/Gets disguise mode.
zero = does not have a disguise.
non-zero = has a disguise.

hascompletelookahead.description: Returns true if there are no corners to turn on the rest of the AI's current path.

heal.description: Adds health to an entity, 0-1 fraction of max_health.

health.description: Set the health (and max_health) of the entity to newHealth.
health.example:
local.entity health 100
// Or

local.health = local.entity.health

healthonly.description: Set the health of the entity to newHealth without changing max_health.

hearing.description: Sets/Gets the hearing radius of the actor.
hearing.example:
local.actor hearing 2500
// Or
local.actor.hearing = 2500
local.hearing = local.actor.hearing

hide.description:
CameraManager:  Hides the paths.
Entity: Hide the entity, opposite of 'show'.
SoundManager:  Hides the sounds.

hidemenu.description: Hide menu, with option to force it off.

hitdamage.description: Set the damage a projectile does when it hits something.

hiteffect.description: Sets the TIKI it will spawn when it's hit.

holster.description:
Actor: Holster weapon.
Player: Holsters all wielded weapons, or unholsters previously put away weapons.

holsterangles.description: Set the angles of this weapon when it is holstered.

holsteroffset.description: Set the positional offset when it is holstered.

holsterscale.description: Set the scale of the weapon when it's attached to the holster.

holstertag.description: Set the name of the tag to attach this to when the weapon is holstered.

huddraw_align.syntax: huddraw_align( Integer index, String h_align, String v_align )
huddraw_align.description:
Sets the alignment of a huddraw element.
Specified with:
"left", "center" or "right" for horizontal alignment
"top", "center" or "bottom" for vertical alignment.

huddraw_alpha.description: Sets the alpha of a huddraw element.

huddraw_color.syntax: huddraw_color( Integer index, Float red, Float green, Float blue )
huddraw_color.description:
Sets the color of a huddraw element.
RGB (red, green, blue) format. From 0 to 1.

huddraw_font.description:
Sets the font to use.

courier-16, courier-18, courier-20
facfont-20
handle-16, handle-18, handle-22, handle-23
marlett, Marlett-20
verdana-12, verdana-14
Delima-30 (SH & BT only)

huddraw_rect.syntax: huddraw_rect( Integer index, Integer x, Integer y, Integer width, Integer height )
huddraw_rect.description:
Specifies the position of the upper left corner and size of a huddraw element.
The x and y position is relative to the position specified with the 'huddraw_align' command.

huddraw_shader.description:
Sets the shader to use for a particular huddraw element.
shader can be the name of a shader or the path to the texture.

huddraw_string.description: Sets a string to be displayed. Clears the shader value.

huddraw_virtualsize.description: Sets if the huddraw element should use virutal screen resolution for positioning and size.

hurt.syntax: hurt( Integer damage, [ String means_of_death ], [ Vector direction ] )
hurt.description: Inflicts damage if the entity is damageable. If the number of damage points specified in the command argument is greater or equal than the entity's current health, it will be killed or destroyed. Means of death values: none, suicide, crush, crush_every_frame, telefrag, lava, slime, falling, last_self_inflicted, explosion, explodewall, electric, electricwater, thrownobject, beam, rocket, impact, bullet, fast_bullet, vehicle, fire, flashbang, on_fire, gib, impale, bash, shotgun, aagun and landmine.

id.description:
Sets the ID for this projectile generator.
Default = 0

idle.description:
Emitter: Animates the puff daddy.
PuffDaddy: Animates the puff daddy.
Weapon: Puts the weapon into an idle state.

idlecheckoffset.description: Sets the offset to trace to for collision checking when idling.

idleinit.description: Puts the weapon into an idle state and clears all the anim slots.

idlesay.description: The name of an idle dialog animation to play.

ignorebadplaces.description: Sets/Gets whether or not this AI guy will ignore bad places (0 = not suicidal)
ignorebadplaces.example:
local.actor ignorebadplaces 1
// Or
local.actor.ignorebadplaces = 1
local.ignorebadplaces = local.actor.ignorebadplaces

ignoreclock.description: Tells a level weather or not to ignore the clock.

immune.syntax:
immune( String immune_string1, [ String immune_string2 ], [ String immune_string3 ],
[ String immune_string4 ], [ String immune_string5 ], [ String immune_string6 ] )
immune.description: Adds to the immunity list for this sentient. Use 'removeimmune' to remove immunity. Valid options are: (Means Of Death) none, suicide, crush, crush_every_frame, telefrag, lava, slime, falling, last_self_inflicted, explosion, explodewall, electric, electricwater, thrownobject, grenade, beam, rocket, impact, bullet, fast_bullet, vehicle, fire, flashbang, on_fire, gib, impale, bash, shotgun, aagun and landmine.
immune.example:
local.entity immune "grenade" "bullet" "fast_bullet"
local.entity immune "aagun" // Spearhead & Breakthrough only
local.entity immune "landmine" // Breakthrough only

impactmarkorientation.description: Set the orientation of the impact mark.

impactmarkradius.description: Set the radius of the impact mark.

impactmarkshader.description: Set the shader of the impact mark.

injail.description:
Set to 1 to indicate when player is in jail, 0 when they are free.
Returns 1 if player is in jail, 0 if out.

inpvs.description: returns 1 if the entities have connected pvs, 0 if not.

inreload.description:
Set to non-zero to indicate the AI is in a reload.
Returns non-zero if the AI is in a reload.

interval.description: Sets/Gets the distance AI tries to keep between squadmates while moving.

// Or
local.actor.interval = 256
local.distance = local.actor.interval

intervaldir.description: Gets the direction the AI would like to move to maintain its interval.

local.player iprint "Lorem ipsumâ€¦" 1 // White message with sound
local.player iprint "Lorem ipsumâ€¦" // Yellow message without sound

iprintln.description:
Prints a string (yellow message), followed by a newline.
It is recommended to use 'iprintln_noloc' instead.

iprintln_noloc.description: Prints a string (yellow message), followed by a newline with no localization conversion.

iprintlnbold.description:
Prints a string,  followed by a newline in bold (white message with sound).
It is recommended to use 'iprintlnbold_noloc' instead.

iprintlnbold_noloc.description:
Prints a string, followed by a newline in bold (white message with sound),
with no localization conversion.

is_disguised.description:
Gets if the player is disguised or not.
zero = not disguised, non-zero = disguised

is_enemy_visible.description: 0 if the enemy is not currently visible, 1 if he is.

isabandoned.description: Returns true if the owner has abandoned the mine.

isalive.description: Returns true if the specified entity exists and has health > 0.

isescaping.description: Return non-zero if escaping or assisting escape.

isimmune.description: Returns true if the given entity is immune to this landmine.

isinside.description: Returns 1 if the entities are touching, 0 if not.

isloopinganim.description: Returns 1 if the anim is a looping anim, or 0 otherwise.

isopen.description: Check to see if door is open (non-zero return value).

isspectator.description: Check to see if player is a spectator (non-zero return value).

istouching.description: Returns 1 if the entities are touching, 0 if not.

isturnedon.description: Returns whether the generator is on or off.

item.description: Gives the sentient the specified amount of the specified item.

item_droptofloor.description: Drops the item to the ground.

jailassistescape.description: Start the assist jail escape animation.

jailescape.description: Start the escape from jail animation.

jailescapestop.description: Stop either the escape from jail or assist animation.

jitteramount.description: Sets the jitter angles to apply to the player.

join_team.description: Join the specified team (allies or axis).

jumpto.description: Jump to specified vector or entity.

jumpxy.syntax: jumpxy( Float forwardmove, Float sidemove, Float speed )

key.description: Set the key needed to make this UseAnim function.

kickdir.description: Gets the direction the AI wants to kick.

kill.description: Console based command to kill yourself if stuck.

// Type kill in the console and press enter
local.entity kill // <-- This does nothing to the entity

kill_axis.description: Kills all of the axis that are in the passed radius, or all of them if radius is 0.

killclass.description: Kills everything in the specified class, except for the specified entity (optional).

killed.syntax:
killed( Entity attacker, Integer damage, Entity inflictor, Vector position, Vector direction,
Vector normal, Integer knockback, Integer damageflags, Integer meansofdeath, Integer location )
killed.description: Event which is sent to an entity once it as been killed.

killedeffect.description: Sets the TIKI it will spawn when it's destroyed.

killtarget.description: When dying kill entities with this targetName.

killthread.description: Set the thread to execute when this model is killed.

killtrace.syntax: killtrace( Vector offset, Vector direction, Float radius, Float distance )
killtrace.description:
Kills all objects along the trace.

offset = Initial offset from origin.
direction = Angular offset orientation for trace.
radius = Thickness of trace.
distance = How far to trace.

knockback.description: Set the knockback of the projectile when it hits something.

landmark_name.description: Set the name of this landmark.

landminedamage.syntax: landminedamage( Entity landmine, Float damage, Float radius )

last_enemy_visible_time.description: Get the last time the enemy was visible, in seconds.

launchsound.description: Set a launch sound for the projectile.

lavaalpha.description: Set the alpha of lava screen blend.

lavacolor.description: Set the color of lava screen blend.

leash.description: Sets/Gets the maximum distance the AI will wander from its leash home.
leash.example:
local.actor leash 2000
// Or
local.actor.leash = 2000
local.result = local.actor.leash

leftvector.description: Get the left vector of angles.

letterbox.description:
Puts the game in letterbox mode.
Use 'clearletterbox' to remove it.

leveltransition.description:
Transitions to the next Level.
Statistics to Map Loading, does not keep player data or game data.

life.description:
FuncBeam: Set the amount of time the beam stays on when activated.
Projectile: Set the life of the projectile.
SmokeGrenade: Sets how long the smoke emitter lives.

light.syntax: light( Float red, Float green, Float blue, Float radius )
light.description: Create a dynmaic light on this entity.

lightblue.description: Set the blue component of the dynmaic light on this entity.

lightgreen.description: Set the green component of the dynmaic light on this entity.

lightoff.description: Turn the configured dynamic light on this entity off.

lighton.description: Turn the configured dynmaic light on this entity on.

lightradius.description: Set the radius of the dynmaic light on this entity.

lightred.description: Set the red component of the dynmaic light on this entity.

lightstyle.description: What light style (setlightstyle) to use for this dynamic light on this entity.
