Fulcrum: Angular limit for the fulcrum.
SinkObject: Maximum displacement of the SinkObject.

linkturret.description: Sets the next turret in the link.

lip.description:
RunThrough: Distance below trigger we should spawn things.
SlidingDoor: Sets the lip of the sliding door.

listinventory.example: $player listinventory // Prints the inventory to the console

loaded.description:
Gives player all new weapons.

This command valid for Spearhead and Breakthrough only.

loc_convert_string.description: Returns a localized version of the string.
loc_convert_string.example: iprintlnbold_noloc  "90" (loc_convert_string " seconds to get to train")

lock.description:
Door: Lock the door.
Vehicle: Sets the vehicle to be locked.
VehicleTurretGun: The Turret can not be used.

locprint.syntax: locprint( Integer Xoffset, Integer Yoffset, String stuffToPrint )
locprint.description: Prints the included message in the specified location of all player's screens.

lod_angles.syntax: lod_angles( Float pitch[0.00-360.00], Float yaw[0.00-360.00], Float roll[0.00-360.00] )
lod_angles.description: Set the angles of the model.

lod_model.description: Set the model of the current viewthing.

lod_roll.description: Set the roll of the model.

lod_spawn.description: Edit LOD on the specified model.

lod_think.description: Called every frame to process the view thing.

lod_yaw.description: Set the yaw of the model.

lookaroundangle.description: Sets/Gets the angle in degrees left or right of center that the AI will look around while patrolling.
lookaroundangle.example:
local.actor lookaroundangle 90
// Or
local.actor.lookaroundangle = 90
local.lookaroundangle = local.actor.lookaroundangle

lookat.description:
Actor:  The actor will look at this entity.
Camera: Makes the camera look at an entity.
lookat.example:
local.actor lookat local.entity
local.camera lookat local.entity

loop.description:
CameraManager: Loop the current path or the specified one.

SplinePath: loop( String loop_name )
Sets the loop name.

loop_protection.description: Sets/Gets if infinite loop protection is enabled.

loopfire.description: Makes the weapon fire by looping the fire animation.

loopsound.syntax: loopsound( String soundName, [ Float volume ], [ String minimum_distance ] )
loopsound.description:
Play a looped-sound with a certain volume and minimum_distance
which is attached to the current entity.

low_wall_arc.description: Marks this node as good for low-wall behavior, and gives the arc.

mainattachtotag.description: Set the name of the tag to attach this to it's owner when being used.

makearray.description:
Creates a two-dimensional HashArray
Always start their indexing at 1.
makearray.example:
local.hasharray = makeArray
	1     2     3
	"one" "two" "three"
	"uno" "dos" "tres"
	"uno" "due" "tre"
	// etc...
endArray

println local.hasharray[2][1] // Prints: one

makenoise.description: Makes the weapon make noise that actors can hear.

map.description:
ScriptThread: Starts the specified map.
TriggerChangeLevel: Sets the map to change to when triggered.

mass.description: Set the mass of this entity.

max_health.description:
Sets max_health without changing health.
Gets the entity's max health.
max_health.example:
local.entity max_health 300
// Or
local.entity.max_health = 300
local.max_health = local.entity.max_health

maxalpha.description: Sets maximum opacity of an individual smoke particle, in 0-1 range.

maxamount.description: Sets the max amount of the item.

maxchargetime.description: Set the maximum time the weapon may be charged up.

maxdelay.description:
ProjectileGenerator: Maximum time between bursts. Default = 10
RandomSpeaker: Sets the maximum time between playings.

maxdist.description: Sets/Gets the maximum distance the AI tries to allow between itself and the player.
maxdist.example:
local.actor maxdist 400
// Or
local.actor.maxdist = 400
local.maxdist = local.actor.maxdist

maxdonut.description: Max extent of donut from player.

maxduration.description:
Sets the maximum duration of bursts (in seconds).
Default = 3.

maxfiremovement.description: Sets the max speed the player can be moving to fire the weapon (fraction of weapon's running speed).

maxgibs.description: Sets the maximum amount of generic gibs this sentient will spawn when hit.

maxidlepitch.description: Sets the offset to trace to for collision checking when idling.

maxidleyaw.description: Sets the offset to trace to for collision checking when idling.

maxmovementsound.description: Sets the weapon's movement fire prevention sound alias.

maxnumshots.description:
Sets the maximum # of shots to fire in a cycle.
Default = 1

maxoffset.description: Set the maximum offset the beam can travel above, below, forward or back of it's endpoints.

maxrange.description: Set the maximum range of a weapon so the AI knows how to use it.

maxs.description: Sets the maximum bounds of the trigger box.

maxuseangle.description: Set max use angle to allow player to mount the turret.

maxyawoffset.description: Sets the max yaw offset from the turrets central facing direction.

meansofdeath.description: Set the meansOfDeath of the weapon/projectile.

meleeattackend.description: Is the end of the sentient's melee attack.

meleeattackstart.description: Is the start of the sentient's melee attack.

message.description:
Trigger: Set a message to be displayed when this trigger is activated.
World: Set a message for the world.

minchargetime.description: Set the minimum time the weapon must be charged up.

mindelay.description:
RandomSpeaker: Sets the minimum time between playings.
ProjectileGenerator: Minimum time between bursts.

mindist.description: Sets/Gets the minimum distance the AI tries to keep between itself and the player.
mindist.example:
local.actor mindist 128
// Or
local.actor.mindist = 128
local.mindist = local.actor.mindist

mindonut.description: Min extent of donut from player.

minduration.description:
Sets the minimum duration of the bursts (in seconds).
Default = 3

minlife.description: Set the minimum life of the projectile (this is for charge up weapons).

minnumshots.description:
Sets the minimum # of shots to fire in a cycle.
Default = 1

minoffset.description: Set the minimun offset the beam can travel above, below, forward or back of it's endpoints.

minrange.description: Set the minimum range of a weapon so the AI knows how to use it.

mins.description: Sets the minimum bounds of the trigger box.

minspeed.description: Set the minimum speed of the projectile (this is for charge up weapons).

missionfailed.description:
Makes the player fail their mission.
level restarts.

missiontransition.description: Transitions to the next Mission. Statistics to Main Menu, Next Level should be unlocked.

model.description: Sets/Gets the model of the entity. Available Classes: AISpawnPoint, Entity, FuncBeam, Object ProjectileGenerator, ScriptModel, ScriptOrigin ScriptSlave, Trigger, TriggerClickItem, Vehicle
model.example:
local.entity model "models/furniture/table.tik"
// Or
local.entity.model = "models/furniture/table.tik"
local.model = local.entity.model

modelname.description: Sets the model name for this spawn entity.

modheight.description:
Change the maximum height of the player.
Can specify "stand", "duck", "duckrun", or a specific height

modheightfloat.description: Specify the view height of the player and the height of his bounding box.

modifydrive.syntax: modifydrive( Float desired_speed, Float acceleration, Float look_ahead )
modifydrive.description: Modifys the parameters of the current drive.

modifyflypath.syntax: modifyflypath( Float speed, Float acceleration, Float look_ahead )
modifyflypath.description:
Makes the script slave fly the specified path with speed and acceleration
until reached_distance close to position.

mood.description: Sets/Gets the AI mood... must be "bored", "nervous", "curious", or "alert".

moveanim.description:
ScriptModel: Makes the script model play an animation and move with the deltas contained in the animation.
Vehicle: Move the vehicle with an animation.

movedir.description:
Actor: Returns a unit vector pointing in the current direction of motion, or zero if not moving.
This still has meaning if velocity is zero but the AI is starting to move on a path.

ScriptDoor: Door's movedir.

movedone.description:
Mover: Sent to commanding thread when done with move.
Parm: movedone...

movedoneradius.description: Set the waittill movedone radius, default 0 means don't use manual radius.

movementspeed.description: Alters the movement speed of the player when he has the weapon out.

movementstealth.description: Sets the current movement stealth scalar for the sentient.

moveoffset.description: Move the position by the offset vector.

moveplayer.description:
CameraManager: Move the player to the current path node position.
SoundManager: Move the player to the current sound position.

moveposflags.description: Used by the state files to tell the game dll what the player is doing.

movesound.description: Sound played when fulcrum is moving.

moveto.description: Actor: moveto( String anim, String dest ) Specify the location to move to, with animation anim. Camera: moveto( Entity ent ) Move the camera's position to that of the specified entities. ScriptSlave: moveto( String vector_or_entity ) Move to the specified vector or entity.
moveto.example:
local.actor moveto "anim_name" $node
local.camera moveto $target_ent
local.script_object moveto $target.origin

movetopos.description: Move the camera's position to the specified position.

moving_from_anim.description: The script model is moving based on an animation.

mprintln.description: Prints a string, followed by a newline.

multifaceted.description:
Make this trigger multifaceted.
If facet is 1, then trigger is North/South oriented.
If facet is 2, then trigger is East/West oriented.
If facet is 3, then trigger is Up/Down oriented.

mumble.description:
Set to 1 if this guy is allowed to mumble, or 0 if he is not
Returns 1 if this guy is allowed to mumble, or 0 if he is not.
mumble.example:
local.actor mumble 1
// Or
local.actor.mumble = 1
local.result = local.actor.mumble

music.description: Sets the current and fallback (optional) music moods.

musicvolume.description: Sets the volume and fade time of the music.

name.description: Item: Sets the item name. Vehicle: Set the name for the vehicle (SH & BT only).

nationality.description:
Sets/Gets the nationality of an actor.
Valid entries are: default, ger, it, usa, uk, and ussr.
Return values are: ger, it, usa, uk, ussr and unset.
nationality.example:
local.actor nationality "it"
// Or
local.actor.nationality = "it"
local.nationality = local.actor.nationality

nationalityprefix.description: Get the three or five letter prefix that denotes the player's nationality.

netname.description: Gets player's name and returns it as string.

neverdraw.description: Sets this entity to never draw.

next.description:
CameraManager: Go to the next path node.
ScriptSlave: Goto the next waypoint.
SoundManager: Go to the next sound.

nextcamera.description: Sets the next camera to use.

nextdrive.description: Appends the specified path to the current path.

nextmap.description: Set the next map to change to.

nextpaintime.description: Set the next time the player experiences pain (Current time + seconds specified).

no_idle.description: Sets/Gets if the actor will not go into idle after playing an animation.

no_remove.description: Makes it so the item is not removed from the world when it is picked up.

noammosound.description: Sets the weapon's dry fire sound alias.

noanimlerp.description: Do not LERP to the next animation.

nodrophealth.description:
zero = automatically drop health according to cvars.
non-zero = don't autodrop health (like hard mode).

nodropweapons.description:
zero = automatically drop weapons.
non-zero = don't autodrop weapons.

noise.description:
FallingRock: Set the sound to play when the rock bounces.
Trigger: Set the sound to play when this trigger is activated.

nolongpain.description:
Sets/Gets if long pain is allowed or not.
1 = long pain is not allowed.
0 = long pain is allowed.
nolongpain.example:
local.actor nolongpain 1
// Or
local.actor.nolongpain = 1
local.nolongpain = local.actor.nolongpain

nonvislevel.description: Visibility level in range 0-1 below which an enemy is treated as non-visible
nonvislevel.example:
local.actor nonvislevel 0.5
// Or
local.actor.nonvislevel = 0.5
local.nonvislevel = local.actor.nonvislevel

normal_damage.description: The Normal Health of the Actor (0 - 100).

normal_health.description: The Normal Health of the entity.

normalangles.description: Sets the object to use normal angles when travelling on a spline path.

normaldraw.description: Sets this entity to normal draw.

northyaw.description: Sets the yaw direction that is considered to be north.

noshadow.description: Turns off the shadow for this sentient.

nosurprise.description:
Set to 0 to allow this guy to play a surprised animation when first encountering an enemy.
Gets whether or not this guy is allowed to play a surprised animation when first encountering an enemy.
nosurprise.example:
local.actor nosurprise 0
// Or
local.actor.nosurprise = 0
local.nosurprise = local.actor.nosurprise

notactive.description: Make the SinkObject not active, so that it won't respond to players touching it.

notarget.description:
Entity: Flag an entity as no target (Spearhead & Breakthrough only).
Player: Toggles the notarget cheat.
notarget.example:
local.entity notarget 1 // Spearhead & Breakthrough only
local.player notarget

noticescale.description:
Sets/Gets the max multiplier in time to notice an enemy.
(default 100, half as big notices twice as fast)
noticescale.example:
local.actor noticescale 1
// Or
local.actor.noticescale = 1
local.noticescale = local.actor.noticescale

notouchdamage.description: Makes the projectile not blow up or deal damage when it touches a damagable object

notready.description: Makes this player not ready for the round to start.

notshootable.description: Makes the script slave not shootable.

nowatch.description:
Camera:
Stop watching an entity or looking along a path.
Camera is now static as far as orientation.
If fadeTime is specified, camera will fade over that time.

CameraManager:
Set the current path node to watch nothing.

num_loops.description: Set the number of times to loop an animation per use.

numarenas.description: Set the number of arenas in the world.

numfireanims.description: Sets the number of fire animations this weapon uses.

numsegments.description: Set the number of segments for the beam.

numspherebeams.description: Set the number of beams that will be shot out in a sphere like formation.

objectivebased.description: Gets whether or not the game is currently objective based or not.

objectivecount.description: Sets the number of objectives completed and the total number of objectives.

offhandattachtotag.description: Set the name of the tag to attach this to it's owner's off hand.

offset.description: RunThrough: offset( Vector spawn_offset ) When triggered, what to offset the spawned object by. UseObject: offset( Vector newOffset ) Sets the offset to use for this UseObject. SmokeGrenade: (SH & BT only) offset( Float offset_x, Float offset_y, Float offset_z ) Sets offset of the smoke volume from the entity.

oneshot.description: Make this a one time trigger.

onfire.description: Called every frame when the sentient is on fire.

openangle.description:
Sets the open angle of the door.
How wide to open the door.

openportal.description: Open the area portal enclosed in this object.

orbit.description: Makes the camera orbit around an entity and optionally watch an entity.

orientedbbox.syntax: orientedbbox( Vector mins, Vector maxs, Float yawoffset )
orientedbbox.description:
Spawn an oriented bounding box with the given dimensions and an angular offset.
mins = Min dimensions of box.
maxs = Max dimensions of box.
yawoffset = Angular offset orientation of box.

origin.description: Sets/Gets the origin of the entity.
origin.example:
local.entity origin ( 300 -2450 130 )
// Or
local.entity.origin = ( 300 -2450 130 )
local.origin = local.entity.origin

overcooked.description: Used when the cookable weapon has been over cooked.

overcooked_warning.description: Causes a warning sound to play that the grenade is about to be overcooked.

overlap.description: Set the amount of overlap the beams have when they are being strung together.

pain.syntax:
pain( Entity attacker, Float damage, Entity inflictor, Vector position, Vector direction,
Vector normal, Integer knockback, Integer damageflags, Integer meansofdeath, Integer location )
pain.description: Used to inflict pain to an entity.

painhandler.description: Sets/Gets the current script that will handle pain events.

papers.description: The level of papers the player currently has.

path_relativeyaw.description: Makes the script slave follow the specified path with a yaw offset.

pathdist.description: Returns total distance along current path to the path goal.

pathdrivable.description: Make the vehicle drivable along a path.

patrolpath.description: Sets/Gets the name of the patrol path for the actor (must have type set to patrol for effect).
patrolpath.example:
local.actor patrolpath "patrolpath03b"
// Or
local.actor.patrolpath = "patrolpath03b"
local.patrolpath = local.actor.patrolpath

pause.description:
Camera: Pause the camera.
ScriptThread: Pauses the thread.

pauseanims.example:
local.entity pauseanims 1 // pause
local.entity pauseanims 0 // unpause

perferredweapon.description: Overrides your perferred weapon that is displayed in the stats screen.

persist.description: Set the persist property of the beam.

physics_on.description:
Turn physics on.
ScriptSlave: If no_collide_entity is set to 1
then the script slave will not collide with other entities.

physics_velocity.description: Add a physical impulse to an object when it is being physically simulated.

pickup.description: Picks up this throw object and attaches it to the entity.

pickup_done.description: Called when the item pickup is done.

pickup_thread.description: Sets the pickup thread for the spawned entity.

pickupsound.description: Sets the item's pickup sound alias.

pitchcaps.description:
Sets the pitch caps for the turret.
First number is upward cap, second is downward cap, and the third just makes it nice little vector.

placeturret.description: Try to place the carryable turret.

planting_team.description: Sets/Gets which team is planting the bomb, 'axis' or 'allies'.
planting_team.example:
level planting_team "allies"
// Or
level.planting_team = "allies"
local.planting_team = level.planting_team

play.description: Play the current path or the specified one once.

playerspawn.syntax: playerspawn( String model_name, [ Float range ], [ Vector vector_offset ], [ Float inFOV ], [ Float speed ] )
playerspawn.description: Spawn something near the player, either within the player's view or behind him. model_name: Name of model to spawn. range: How close does this need to be to the player to actually get spawned, default 480 (30 foot radius). vector_offset: Oriented vector offset of where to spawn the item, default ( 0 0 0 ) inFOV: 1 = Only spawn when this position is within the FOV of the player -1 = Only spawn when this position is outside the FOV of the player 0 = (default) Don't care, always spawn speed: How fast the effect should travel, in other words, how long before the effect gets spawned. Delay is calculated based on the distance between object and player divided by the speed. 0 = no delay 960 = (default) 60 feet per second. If the object is 60 feet from the player, the player effect will spawn one second later.

playsound.syntax: playsound( String soundName, [ Integer channel ], [ Float volume ], [ Float min_distance ], [ Float pitch ] )
playsound.description:
Play a sound coming from this entity. Default channel, CHAN_BODY.

Sound channel priority from lowest to highest is:
0 = auto
1 = body
2 = item
3 = weaponidle
4 = voice
5 = local
6 = weapon
7 = dialog_secondary
8 = dialog
9 = menu

pointat.description: The actor will point at this entity.

pophelmet.description: Pops a sentient's helmet off if he's got one.

position.description: Sets/Gets the Position the Actor wants to be and should animate towards.

powerupname.description: Specifies the powerup to give to the sentient.

poweruptimer.description: Sets the powerup timer and powerup type.

prealarmthread.description:
Sets the name of the pre alarm thread for the actor.
(Must have type set to alarm for effect).

preimpactsoundprob.description:
Set the chance for a pre-impact sound to occur.
Range: ( 0.0, 1.0 ), with 0 having no chance, and 1 always occurring.

preimpactsoundtime.description: Set the time before impact to play the preimpact sound.

prethink.description: Make the projectile think to update it's velocity.

prev.description:
CameraManager: Go to the previous path node.
SoundManager: Go to the previous sound.

previewreverb.description: Test out the current reverb settings.

primarydmweapon.description:
Sets the player's primary DM weapon.

rifle, sniper, smg,
mg, heavy, shotgun
and landmine (Breakthrough)

primaryfireheld.description: Returns 1 if this player is holding the primary fire, or 0 if not.

print3d.syntax: print3d( Vector origin, Float scale, String string )

println.syntax: println( String string1, [ String string2 ], â€¦ )
println.description: Prints a string, followed by a newline.

projectile.description: Set the model of the projectile that this weapon fires.

projectilevulnerable.description:
Make vehicle vulnerable to being one-shot by projectiles.
If number_of_hits is given, it will take this many shots.

pusher.syntax: pusher( Entity inflictor, Entity attacker, Vector direction, Float force )
pusher.description: Push an entity in the specified direction with the specified force.

putawayweapon.description: Put away or deactivate the current weapon, whichHand can be: left, right or dual.

querydriverslotangles.description: Returns the angles of the specified slot on the vehicle.

querydriverslotentity.description: Returns an entity at the specified slot.

querydriverslotposition.description: Returns the position of the specified slot on the vehicle.

querydriverslotstatus.description: Returns the status of the specified slot on the vehicle.

queryfreedriverslot.description: Returns a number that represents the first free driver slot on the vehicle.

queryfreepassengerslot.description: Returns a number that represents the first free passenger slot on the vehicle.

queryfreeturretslot.description: Returns a number that represents the first free turret slot on the vehicle.

querypassengerslotentity.description: Returns an entity at the specified slot.

querypassengerslotposition.description: Returns the position of the specified slot on the vehicle.

querypassengerslotstatus.description: Returns the status of the specified slot on the vehicle.

queryspeed.description: Returns the current speed of the vehicle.

queryturretslotentity.description: Returns an entity at the specified slot.

queryturretslotposition.description: Returns the position of the specified slot on the vehicle.

queryturretslotstatus.description: Returns the status of the specified slot on the vehicle.

quiet.description:
Makes the weapon make no noise.
Don't notify AI of it being fired.

radius.description: Explosion: Set the radius for the explosion. FuncBeam: Set the starting radius of the beams if this is a beamsphere. ViewJitter: Sets the max radius of the view jitter. 0 affects all. ThrobbingBox_explosive: Set the radius for the explosion.

radiusdamage.syntax: radiusdamage( Vector origin, Float damage, Float radius, [ Integer constant_damage ] )
radiusdamage.description: ScriptThread: Radius damage at origin. Explosion: Set the radius damage an explosion does.

radnum.description:
Sets/Gets the entity's radnum.

'radnum' is the "Radiant Number" of an entity that was added to
the map using the MohRadiant editor and is stored in the bsp file.

Dynamic entities like players, weapons, and entities spawned from scripts return -1.

$world.radnum always returns 0.

random.description: Sets the randomness value of the explosion.

random_velocity.description: Set the amount of random variation of the base velocity.

randomfloat.description: Returns a random float number between 0 and 'max'.
randomfloat.example:
local.result = randomfloat 2 // A number between 0 and 2
local.result = randomfloat -5 // A number between 0 and -5

randomint.description:
Returns a random integer number between 0 and 'max'
Including 0 but not 'max'.
randomint.example:
local.result = randomint 2 // Can return 0 or 1
local.result = randomint -3 // Can return: 0, -1 or -2

range.description: Set the range of the weapon.

rank.description: Set the order value and power ranking for the weapon.

ready.description:
Player: Makes this player ready for the round to start
Player: Returns 1 if this player is ready, 0 otherwise.

Weapon: Signals the end of the ready animation so the weapon can be used.

realism.description: Makes a command be executed only in realism mode.

releasefire.description: Releases the attack in the time specified.

releaseplayer.description:
Release all the players.
Opposite of 'freezeplayer'.

reload_mg42.description: Reload the mg42 - only used by machinegunner.

reloaddelay.description: Set a delay that implies a reload. Will also play a sound.

reloadshots.description: Set the number of shots fired before forcing a reload.

reloadweapon.description: Reloads the weapon in the specified hand.

remove.description: Removes this listener the next time events are processed.

removeattachedmodel.syntax: removeattachedmodel( String tagname, [ Float fadeRate ], [ String modelName ] )
removeattachedmodel.description: Removes the model attached to this entity at the specified tag.

removeclass.description: Removes all of the entities in the specified class, except for the specified entity (optional).

removeimmune.syntax:
removeimmune( String immune_string1, [ String immune_string2 ], [ String immune_string3 ],
[ String immune_string4 ], [ String immune_string5 ], [ String immune_string6 ] )
removeimmune.description: Removes from the immunity list for this entity.

removeondeath.description: If set to zero, vehicles will not be removed when they die.

removewhenstopped.description: Make the projectile get removed when it stops.

renamepath.description: Rename the path to the new name.

render_terrain.description: Set to draw or not draw terrain.

rendereffects.syntax:
rendereffects( [ String parameter1 ], [ String parameter2 ], [ String parameter3 ],
[ String parameter4 ], [ String parameter5 ], [ String parameter6 ] )
rendereffects.description:
Change the current render effects flags.

Valid flags are as follows:
+ sets a flag, - clears a flag
dontdraw - send the entity to the client, but don't draw
betterlighting - do sphere based vertex lighting on the entity
lensflare - add a lens glow to the entity at its origin
viewlensflare - add a view dependent lens glow to the entity at its origin
lightoffset - use the dynamic color values as a light offset to the model
skyorigin - this entity is the portal sky origin
minlight - this entity always has some lighting on it
fullbright - this entity is always fully lit
additivedynamiclight - the dynamic light should have an additive effect
lightstyledynamiclight - the dynamic light uses a light style, use the
'lightstyle' command to set the index of the light style to be used

replace.description:
CameraManager:
Replace the current path node position/angle with the player's.

SoundManager:
Replace the current sound position with the player's.

reset.description:
Fulcrum:
Reset the fulcrum right now.

SinkObject:
 Reset the SinkObject right now.

SoundManager:
Resets the state of all sounds and triggers.

reset_time.description: Sets the time it takes for the UseObject to reset itself.

resetdelay.description: Delay between when sinkobject starts resetting.

resethaveitem.description: Resets the game var that keeps track that we have gotten this weapon.

resetleash.description: Resets the AI's leash to their current position.

resetreverb.description: Reset the reverb settings to a normal.

resetsound.description: Sound played when sinkobject is resetting.

resetspeed.description:
Fulcrum:
Speed at which fulcrum resets itself, defaults to 0.002 * speed.

SinkObject:
Speed at which SinkObject resets itself, defaults to 0.002 * speed.

respawn.description:
Player: Respawns the player.

Item: Respawns the item.

respawn_done.description: Called when the item respawn is done.

respawnsound.description: Turns on the respawn sound for this item.

restoremusicvolume.description: Restores the music volume to its previous value.

restoresoundtrack.description: Restores the soundtrack to the previous one.

reverblevel.description: Sets the reverb level to be used when triggered.

revive.description: Sets the health, even if dead.

rightvector.description: Get the right vector of angles.

rotateaxis.description: Rotate about the specified axis at the specified angular velocity.

rotateaxisdown.description: Rotate the specified axis down by the specified amount.

rotateaxisdownto.description: Rotate the specified axis down to angle.

rotateaxisup.description: Rotate the specified axis up by the specified amount.

rotateaxisupto.description: Rotate the specified axis up to angle.

rotatedbbox.description: Sets/Gets the entity's bbox to rotate with it.

rotatedownto.description: Rotate down to the specified direction.

rotateupto.description: Rotate up to the specified direction.

rotatex.description: Rotate about the x axis at the specified angular velocity.

rotatexdown.description: Rotate the x down by the specified amount.

rotatexdownto.description: Rotate the x down to angle.

rotatexup.description: Rotate the x up by the specified amount.

rotatexupto.description: Rotate the x up to angle.

rotatey.description: Rotate about the y axis at the specified angular velocity.

rotateydown.description: Rotate the y down by the specified amount.

rotateydownto.description: Rotate the y down to angle.

rotateyup.description: Rotate the y up by the specified amount.

rotateyupto.description: Rotate the y up to angle.

rotatez.description: Rotate about the z axis at the specified angular velocity.

rotatezdown.description: Rotate the z down by the specified amount.

rotatezdownto.description: Rotate the z down to angle.

rotatezup.description: Rotate the z up by the specified amount.

rotatezupto.description: Rotate the z up to angle.

roundbased.description: Gets whether or not the game is currently round based or not.

roundstarted.description: Gets whether or not the round has started.

runanimrate.description: Sets/Gets the rate at which the run animation plays back.
runanimrate.example:
local.actor runanimrate 1.5
// Or
local.actor.runanimrate = 1.5
local.runanimrate = local.actor.runanimrate

runsounds.description: Makes the vehicle play running sounds.

runto.description: Specify the location to run to.

safeholster.description:
Holsters all wielded weapons, or unholsters previously put away weapons.
Preserves state, so it will not holster or unholster unless necessary.

safesolid.description: Make solid but first make sure no one is in my bounds that is thinking.

safezoom.description: 0 turns off zoom, and 1 returns zoom to previous setting.

save.description:
CameraManager: Saves the camera path.

SoundManager: Saves the sounds.

savemap.description: Saves the camera path to a map file.

savename.description: Sets the name which is appended to the world.message for this specific autosave.

say.description: The name of a dialog animation to play.

saydone.description: Even used by sound-only special case of say to trigger waittill saydone.

scale.description:
Entity: Sets/Gets the scale of the entity.
SmokeGrenade: Sets initial scale of each smoke volume.
scale.example:
local.entity scale 2
// Or
local.entity.scale = 2
local.scale = local.entity.scale

scalerate.description: Sets how fast the smoke volume grows.

score.description: Show the score for the current deathmatch game.

scriptshader.syntax: scriptshader( String shaderCommand, Float argument1, [ Float argument2 ] )
scriptshader.description:
Alias for shader command, change a specific shader parameter for the entity.

Valid shader commands are:
translation [trans_x] [trans_y] - change the texture translation
offset [offset_x] [offset_y] - change the texture offset
rotation [rot_speed] - change the texture rotation speed
frame [frame_num] - change the animated texture frame
wavebase [base] - change the base parameter of the wave function
waveamp [amp] - change the amp parameter of the wave function
wavebase [phase] - change the phase parameter of the wave function
wavefreq [freq] - change the frequency parameter of the wave function

scriptslave_followingpath.description: Called every frame to actually follow the path.

scriptslave_movedone.description: Called when the script slave is done moving.

seatanglesoffset.description: Set the angles offset of the seat.

seatoffset.description: Set the offset of the seat.

secondary.syntax:
secondary( [ String arg1 ], [ String arg2 ], [ String arg3 ], [ String arg4 ],
[ String arg5 ], [ String arg6 ], [ String arg7 ], [ String arg8 ] )
secondary.description: Set the secondary mode of the weapon, by passing commands through.

secondaryammoinhud.description: Makes the weapon show its secondary ammo to the hud.

secondaryfireheld.description: Returns 1 if this player is holding the secondary fire, or 0 if not.

semiauto.description: Sets the weapon to fire semi-auto.

server.syntax:
server( [ String arg1 ], [ String arg2 ], [ String arg3 ],
[ String arg4 ], [ String arg5 ], [ String arg6 ] )
server.description:
Server only command.
Parses strings into scripting commands.

set_objective_pos.description: Sets the position in the world of the current objective.

setactionanim.syntax: setactionanim( String base_anim, Float lower_limit, Float upper_limit )
setactionanim.description: Set the base action animation and range that they cover.

setaimanim.description: Set the aim animation and frame for when a weapon fires.

setaimmotionanim.syntax: setaimmotionanim( String anim_crouch, String anim_stand, String anim_high )
setaimmotionanim.description: Set aim motion animation (handler scripts only).

setaimoffset.description: Makes the turret aim with specified offset

setaimtarget.description:
Actor: setaimtarget( Entity entity )
Sets the primary weapon's aim target.

TurretGun: setAimTarget( [ String target ] )
Makes the turret aim at an entity.

setanim.syntax: setanim( String anim, Integer slot, Float weight, String flagged )

setanimlength.description: Set the maximum time an animation will play.

setbaseentity.description: Sets the base entity to take its orientation from.

setcontrollerangles.description: Sets the control angles for the specified bone.

setcurrent.description:
Objective: Set this objective as current.

TOWObjective: Set this objective as the current objective for the specified team.
Teams are as such:
0 = Axis
1 = Allies
2 = Neutral

setcurrentobjective.description:
Sets the specified objective as the current objective (for the team, if given).
'team' arg is valid only for Breakthrough.

setcvar.description: Sets the value of the specified cvar.

setfadetime.description: Set the fadetime of the current path node.

setfov.description: Set the fov at the current path node.

sethelmet.syntax: sethelmet( String tikifile, Float popspeed, Float dmgmult, String surfacename, [ String optional ] )
sethelmet.description: Gives the sentient a helmet and sets the needed info for it.

setlightstyle.description: Set up the lightstyle with lightstyleindex to the specified data.

setmeansofdeath.description: Set the damage means of death.

setplayerusable.description:
Sets wether the turret can be used by players.
0 means no, 1 means yes.

setreloadcover.description:
Do this command to let the AI know it needs to reload.
Used to reload while going to cover.

setsay.description: The name of a dialog animation to play. Used by animation script only.

setscoreboardtoggle.description: Sets the specified team's scoreboard toggle.

setshaderdata.description: Sets the shader controllers for this entity.

setshadertime.description: Reset the shader time for this entity.

setsize.description: Set the bounding box of the entity to mins and maxs.

setsoundparameters.syntax: setsoundparameters( Float min_speed, Float min_pitch, Float max_speed, Float max_pitch )
setsoundparameters.description: Sets the Sound parameters for this vehicle.

setspeed.description: Set the speed of the camera at the current path node.

setswitchthread.description: Set the thread to execute when turret is switched.

settargetentity.description: Set the entity to point the turret at visually.

setthread.description: Trigger: Set the thread to execute when this trigger is activated. TurretGun: Sets the name of the thread called when a player uses the turret. ThrobbingBox_Explosive: Set the thread to execute when this object is used.

setupperanim.description: Set the upper body animation. Used by animation script only.

setusable.description:
Sets wether the turret can be used as a weapon.
0 means no, 1 means yes.

setusethread.description: Set the thread to execute when this object is used.

setvolumeparameters.syntax: setvolumeparameters( Float min_speed, Float min_volume, Float max_speed, Float max_volume )
setvolumeparameters.description: Sets the Volume parameters for this vehicle.

setweapon.description: Set the weapon for the vehicle.

setweaponidlestate.description: Set the idle state of the given weapon.

setyawfrombone.description: Set the yaw of the model based on the current animation time.

severity.description: How violently the debris should be ejected.

shader.description: Entity shader( String shaderCommand, Float argument1, [ Float argument2 ] ) Change a specific shader parameter for the entity. Valid shader commands are: translation [trans_x] [trans_y] - change the texture translation offset [offset_x] [offset_y] - change the texture offset rotation [rot_speed] - change the texture rotation speed wavebase [base] - change the base parameter of the wave function waveamp [amp] - change the amp parameter of the wave function wavebase [phase] - change the phase parameter of the wave function wavefreq [freq] - change the frequency parameter of the wave function FuncBeam shader( String beam_shader ) Set the shader that the beam will use.

shadow.description: Turns on the shadow for this sentient.

share_enemy.description:
Internal code use only.
Shares an AI's enemy with his squad mates.

share_grenade.description:
Internal code use only.
Shares an AI's grenade with his squad mates.

shareclip.description: Sets the weapon to share the same clip between all fire modes.

shoot.description:
FuncBeam: Make the beam cause damage to entities that get in the way.

TurretGun: Shoot the weapon.

Weapon: Shoot the weapon.

shootradius.description: Set the radius of the damage area between beam endpoints.

show.description:
Entity, Player: Show the entity, opposite of 'hide'.
CameraManager: Shows the specified path.
SoundManager: Show all the sounds.

showmenu.description: Show menu, with option to force it on.

showquakes.description:
Sets the camera to show or not show earthquake effects
from the player triggered either from the earthquake command, or a viewjitter.

showweapon.description: Set the weapon to be show in the view.

sight.description: Sets/Gets the vision distance of the actor.
sight.example:
local.actor sight 2000
// Or
local.actor.sight = 2000
local.sight = local.actor.sight

sighttrace.syntax: sighttrace( Vector start, Vector end, [ Integer pass_entities ], [ Vector mins ], [ Vector maxs ] )
sighttrace.description:
Performs a trace line from the start to the end.
Returns 0 if something was hit and 1 otherwise.

silent.description:
Set to 0 to prevent this guy from saying stuff besides pain and death sounds.
Gets whether or not this guy is allowed to say stuff besides pain and death sounds.
silent.example:
local.actor silent 1
// Or
local.actor.silent = 1
local.result = local.actor.silent

sin.description: Reborn: Returns the sine of an angle of x radians. Breakthrough: Sine of float (expects degrees not radians).

sinksound.description: Sound played when sinkobject is sinking.

size.description: Returns the number of elements in the array.

skidding.description: Makes the vehicle skid around corners.

skill.description: Returns the difficulty level of the game.

skyalpha.description: Set the alpha on the sky.

skybox_farplane.description: Sets/Gets the distance of the skybox far clipping plane.

skybox_speed.description: Sets/Gets the speed of the skybox.

skyportal.description: Whether or not to use the sky portal at all.

smashthroughglass.description:
Makes the projectile smash through windows &
other damageble glass objects when going above a set speed.

sound.description: Set the sound to play when this trigger is activated.

sound_awareness.description:
Sets/Gets the awareness of sounds in 0-100 percent chance
of hearing a sound within half of the sound's radius.
Fades to zero outside sound's radius.
sound_awareness.example:
local.actor sound_awareness 75
// Or
local.actor.sound_awareness = 75
local.sound_awareness = local.actor.sound_awareness

sound_close_end.description: Sets the sound to use when the door closes.

sound_close_start.description: Sets the sound to use when the door closes.

sound_locked.description: Sets the sound to use when the door is locked.

sound_message.description: Sets the sound to use when the door displays a message.

sound_open_end.description: Sets the sound to use when the door stops to opens.

sound_open_start.description: Sets the sound to use when the door starts to opens.

soundset.description: Sets the Sound Set to use.

sp.description: Makes a command be executed only in single player.

spawn.syntax:
spawn( String entityname, [ String keyname1 ], [ String value1 ], [ String keyname2 ], [ String value2 ],
[ String keyname3 ], [ String value3 ], [ String keyname4 ], [ String value4 ] )

spawnchance.description: Sets the chance that this spawned entity will spawn something when killed, if it is an actor.

spawnflags.description: Spawnflags from the BSP, these are set inside the editor.

spawnitem.description:
Adds this named item to what will be spawned when
this spawned entity is killed, if it is an actor.

spawnlife.description: Sets how long each smoke volume lives.

spawnrate.description: Sets how many smoke volumes are spawned per second.

spawnspot.description: Sets the spawn spot to use.

spawntarget.description: Sets spawn target for this spawn entity.

spawntargetname.description: Sets spawn target name for this spawn entity.

spawnturret.description: Spawns a turret with the specified model and connects it to the specified slot.

speed.description:
Sets the speed.

Avalaible Classes:
Camera, FallingRock, Fulcrum, Projectile,
RunThrough , ScriptSlave, SinkObject, SlidingDoor,
SplinePath, TriggerPush, TriggerPushAny

spin.description: Sets the number of rotations per second for this entity around its z axis.

splinepath_create.description: Creates the spline path from the target list.

sprealism.description: Makes a command be executed only in single player realism mode.

sqrt.description: Returns the square root of x.

start.description:
Camera: Start camera moving.
FallingRock: Starts rock falling.
PushObject: Sets up the pushobject.
TreeModel: Initializes the tree a little.
Vehicle: Initialize the vehicle.

startammo.description: Set the starting ammo of this weapon.

startingammotoowner.description: Internal event used to give ammo to the owner of the weapon.

startitem.description: Adds an item to the starting loadout of the weapon.

startyaw.description: Sets the yaw to be used as the center of our allowed turn arc.

state.description:
Player: Dumps the player's state to the console.
UseAnim: Set the state to use for the player.
UseAnimDestination: Set the state to use for the player.
UseObject: Sets the state to use for this UseObject.

state_backwards.description: Sets the backward state to use for this UseObject.

stationary.description: Entity does not move, causes no physics to be run on it.

steerinplace.description: Set the vehicle to turn in place.

stop.description:
Camera: Stop the camera movement.
CameraManager: Stop the camera playing path.
ScriptSlave: Stop the script slave.
Vehicle: Make the Vehicle Stop Moving... FULL BREAKS!

stopatend.description: Makes the vehicle slow down to a complete stop at the end of the path.

stopbackwardsvelocity.description: Stops any backwards motion for vehicles on rails.

stopfire.description: Stops the firing of the weapon in the specified hand.

stopforwardsvelocity.description: Stops any forward motion for vehicles on rails.

stoploopsound.description: Stop the looped-sound on this entity.

stoponfire.description: Stops the sentient from being on fire.

stopped.description: Sent when entity has stopped bouncing for MOVETYPE_TOSS.

stopsound.description:
Stop the current sound on the specified channel.
Default channel, CHAN_BODY.

stopteamrespawn.description: Stops a team (anerican, german, both) from spawning in non-wave deathmatches.

stopwatch.description:
Starts a stopwatch for a given duration.
Use 0 to clear the stopwatch.

stopwatchingactor.description: Makes the player's camera stop watching the specified actor.

stuffcmd.syntax:
stuffcmd( [ String arg1 ], [ String arg2 ], [ String arg3 ],
[ String arg4 ], [ String arg5 ], [ String arg6 ] )

stufftext.description: Stuffs text to the player's console.

stunend.description: Is the end of the sentient's stun.

stunstart.description: Is the start of the sentient's stun.

suppresschance.description: Sets the percent chance of doing suppressing fire when appropriate (0-100)
suppresschance.example:
local.actor suppresschance 80
// Or
local.actor.suppresschance = 80
local.result = local.actor.suppresschance

suppressheight.description: Sets the vertical radius of suppression fire.

suppresswaittime.description: Sets the suppression wait nonfiring time before turret returns to default position.

suppresswidth.description: Sets the horizontal radius of suppression fire.

surface.syntax:
surface( String surfaceName, [ String parameter1 ], [ String parameter2 ], [ String parameter3 ],
[ String parameter4 ], [ String parameter5 ], [ String parameter6 ] )
surface.description:
Change a legs surface parameter for the given surface.
+ sets the flag, - clears the flag
Valid surface commands are:
skin1 - set the skin1 offset bit
skin2 - set the skin2 offset bit
nodraw - don't draw this surface

svflags.syntax:
svflags( [ String parameter1 ], [ String parameter2 ], [ String parameter3 ],
[ String parameter4 ], [ String parameter5 ], [ String parameter6 ] )
svflags.description:
Change the current server flags.
Valid flags are as follows:
+ sets a flag, - clears a flag
broadcast - always send this entity to the client

switchfacet.description: Switch the current facet that we are editing.

take.description: Takes away the specified item from the sentient.

takeall.description: Clears out the sentient's entire inventory.

takeover.description:
Sets the team controlling the objective.
0 = Axis
1 = Allies

takepain.description: Set whether or not to take pain.

tan.description: Reborn: Returns the tangent of an angle of x radians. Breakthrough: Tangent of float (expects degrees not radians).

target.description:
Target another entity with targetname_to_target.

FuncBeam: Set the target of the beam.
The beam will be drawn from the origin to the origin of the target entity.
target.example:
local.entity target "targetname"
// Or
local.entity.target = "targetname"
local.target = local.entity.target

targetname.example:
local.entity targetname "name"
// Or
local.entity.targetname = "name"
local.targetname = local.entity.targetname

targets_destroyed.description: Sets/Gets the number of bomb targets that have been destroyed.
targets_destroyed.example:
level targets_destroyed 1
// Or
level.targets_destroyed = 1
local.result = level.targets_destroyed

targets_to_destroy.description: Sets/Gets the number of bomb targets that must be destroyed.
targets_to_destroy.example:
level targets_to_destroy 2
// Or
level.targets_to_destroy = 2
local.result = level.targets_to_destroy

targettype.description:
Sets the target type to be none, any, or player.
Gets the target type.

team.description:
Entity: Used to make multiple entities move together.
Sentient: Returns 'german' or 'american'

teamwin.description: Sets that the "axis" or the "allies" have won the map.

testplayeranim.description: Plays a test animation on the player.

testthread.description:
Starts the named thread at label if provided.
Console command.

tether.description: The entity to which the AI's leash should be tethered.

thinkstate.description:
Gets current AI think state.
Can be: void, idle, pain, killed, attack, curious, disguise, or grenade.

thread.description: Creates a thread starting at label.

threadmove.description: Move the script slave and create thread which waits until finished.

threatbias.description: Sets/Gets the threat bias for this player / AI.
threatbias.example:
local.actor threatbias 5000
// Or
local.actor.threatbias = 5000
local.threatbias = local.actor.threatbias

throughmetal.description: Sets how far the bullets can go through metal.

throughwood.description: Sets how far the bullets can go through wood.

throw.description: Listener, ScriptThread: throw( String label ) Throws to the specified label. ThrowObject: throw( Entity owner, Float speed, Entity targetent, [ Float grav ] ) Throw this throw object.

throwgib.syntax: throwgib( Entity ent, Integer velocity, Float scale )

throwsound.description: Sets the sound to play when object is thrown.

tileshader.description:
Set the shader that the beam will use.
This shader will be tiled.

time.description: Door: Sets the time it takes for the door to open an close. Level: Gets the current level time. ScriptSlave: Sets the travel time.

toggledelay.description:
Causes a beam toggling effect. Sets the time between toggling.
If random is specified, The time will be between 0 and time.

toggledoor.description: Toggles the state of the door (open/close).

toggleitem.description: Toggles the use of the player's item (first item if he has multiple).

toss.description: Entity has gravity applied to it.

trace.syntax: trace( Vector start, Vector end, [ Integer pass_entities ], [ Vector mins ], [ Vector maxs ] )
trace.description: Performs a Trace Line from the start to the end, returns the end or the position it hit at.

tracerfreq.description: Set the frequency of the tracers.

tracerfrequency.description: Set the frequency of making tracers.

tracerspeed.description:
Scale factor of how fast a tracer should travel.
Valid ranges 0-2.

trigger.description: Trigger the specified target or entity.

triggereffect.description: Send event to owner of trigger.

triggereffectalt.description:
Send event to owner of trigger.
This event is only triggered when using a trigger as a multi-faceted edge trigger.

triggername.description: If set, trigger will only respond to objects with specified name.

triggertarget.description:
SplinePath: Sets the trigger target.
UseAnim: Sets what should be triggered, when this UseAnim is triggered.
UseObject: Sets what should be triggered, when this UseObject is triggered.

trysolid.description: Tries to make the door solid.

turn.description: Causes player to turn the specified amount.

turndoneerror.description: Sets/Gets the error amount that turndone will occur for the turnto command.
turndoneerror.example:
local.actor turndoneerror 70
// Or
local.actor.turndoneerror = 70
local.turndoneerror = local.actor.turndoneerror

turnlegs.description: Turns the players legs instantly by the specified amount.

turnoff.description: Turn Off and cancel the current cycle (if any).

turnon.description: Turn On and begin the first cycle.

turnrate.description: Set the turning rate of the vehicle.

turnspeed.description:
Actor: The turn speed of the actor.
TurretGun, VehicleTurretGun: Sets the turret's turn speed.

turnto.description: Actor: turnto( Entity entity ) The actor will turn to this entity. Camera: turnto( Vector angle ) Makes the camera look in the specified direction.

turnupdate.description: Causes player to turn the specified amount.

turret.description:
Actor:
Sets/Gets the turret of the actor.

Player: (Breakthrough only)
Returns the turret the player is using. NULL if player isn't using a turret.
turret.example:
local.actor turret $turret
// Or
local.actor.turret = $turret
local.turret = local.actor.turret

turretenter.description: Called when someone gets into a turret.

turretexit.description: Called when driver gets out of the turret.

turrettik.description: TIKI of the turret to place.

tweakladderpos.description: Tweaks the player's position on a ladder to be proper.

type_attack.description: Sets/Gets the attack type of the actor.
type_attack.example:
local.actor type_attack "cover"
// Or
local.actor.type_attack = "cover"
local.type_attack = local.actor.type_attack

type_disguise.description: Sets/Gets the disguise type of the actor.
type_disguise.example:
local.actor type_disguise "salute"
// Or
local.actor.type_disguise = "salute"
local.type_disguise = local.actor.type_disguise

type_grenade.description: Sets/Gets the grenade type of the actor.
type_grenade.example:
local.actor type_grenade "grenade"
// Or
local.actor.type_grenade = "grenade"
local.type_grenade = local.actor.type_grenade

type_idle.description: Sets/Gets the idle type of the actor.
type_idle.example:
local.actor type_idle "idle"
// Or
local.actor.type_idle = "idle"
local.type_idle = local.actor.type_idle

unattachfromladder.description: Unattaches the player from a ladder.

unbind.description: Unbind this entity from its parent.

unglue.description: Unglue this entity from its parent.

unlock.description: Door: Unlock the door. Vehicle: Sets the vehicle to be unlocked. VehicleTurretGun: The Turret Can be used.

unregister.description: Unregisters the label from the event of the same name.

updateendpoint.description: Update the endpoint of a beam.

updateinput.description:
CameraManager: Updates the current node with user interface values.
SoundManager: Updates the current sound with user interface values.

updateorigin.description: Update the origin of a beam.

updatepoweruptime.description: Called once a second to decrement powerup time.

upvector.description: Gets the up vector of angles.

use.description: Use the specified weapon or item in the hand choosen (optional).

usebbox.description: Do not perform perfect collision, use bounding box instead.

useheld.description: Returns 1 if this player is holding use, or 0 if he is not.

usematerial.description: The name of the material that glows when active.

usenoammo.description: Set the weapon to be able to be used when it's out of ammo.

userdistance.description: Sets the distance the user should be placed at while using this turret.

usestuff.description: Makes the player try to use whatever is in front of him.

useweaponclass.description:
Use the weapon of the specified class in the hand choosen (optional).

Classes: pistol, rifle, smg, mg, grenade, agrenade, heavy, shotgun
and landmine (Breakthrough)

vector_closer.syntax: vector_closer( Vector vector1, Vector vector2, Vector vector3 )
vector_closer.description: returns 1 if the first vector is closer than the second vector to the third vector.

vector_cross.description: Returns vector1 x vector2 (Cross product).

vector_dot.description: Returns vector1 * vector2 (Dot product).

vector_length.description: Returns the length of the specified vector.

vector_normalize.description:
Returns the normalized vector of the specified vector.
Normalizing a vector is to make its length 1 while maintaining its direction.

vector_within.syntax: vector_within( Vector position1, Vector position2, Float distance )
vector_within.description:
Returns 1 if the two points are <= distance apart,
or 0 if they are greater than distance apart.

vehicle.description:
Returns the vehicle the player is using (Breakthrough only).
NULL if player isn't using a vehicle.

vehicleanim.description:
Sets an animation to use in the LD Animation slot.
Weight defaults to 1.0.

vehiclebouncy.description: Sets the Bouncy Coefficient for the shocks.

vehicleinit.description: Initialized the Vehicle as the specified file.

vehiclemass.description: Sets the mass of the vehicle (backmass = frontmass = mass/2).

vehicleradius.description: Sets the radius of the wheels.

vehicleroll.syntax: vehicleRoll( Float min, Float max, Float coef )
vehicleroll.description: Sets the Roll min and max and the acceleration coefficient for the shocks.

vehiclerollingresistance.description: Sets the radius of the wheels.

vehiclesoudnentity_updatetraces.description: Updates the traces of a Vehicle Sound Entity.

vehiclesoundentity_postspawn.description: PostSpawn of a Vehicle Sound Entity.

vehiclespeed.description: Set the speed of the vehicle.

vehiclespringy.description: Sets the Springy Coefficient for the shocks.

vehicletread.description: Sets the size of the wheels.

vehicleyaw.syntax: vehicleYaw( Float min, Float max, Float coef )
vehicleyaw.description: Sets the Yaw min and max and the acceleration coefficient for the shocks.

vehiclez.syntax: vehicleZ( Float min, Float max, Float coef )
vehiclez.description: Sets the Z min and max and the acceleration coefficient for the shocks.

velocity.description: Sets/Gets the velocity for this entity.

viewangles.description: Player, TurretGun: Sets/Gets the view angles of the entity. ViewMaster, Viewthing: Set the angles of the current viewthing.

viewanimate.description:
Cycle through the animations modes of the current viewthing.
No Animation
Animation with no motion
Animation with looping motion
Animation with motion

viewattach.description: Attach a model to the specified tagname.

viewdetach.description: Detach the current viewthing from its parent.

viewdetachall.description: Detach all the models attached to the current viewthing.

viewjitter.description: Sets the amount that the owner's view should be jittered when fired.

viewkick.syntax: viewkick( Float pitchmin, Float pitchmax, [ Float yawmin ], [ Float yawmax ] )
viewkick.description: Adds kick to the view of the owner when fired.

viewlastframe.description: Called when the view things last animation frame is displayed.

viewmodel.description: Set the model of the current viewthing.

viewmodelanim.description: Sets the player's view model animation.

viewnext.description: Advance to the next frame of animation of the current viewthing.

viewnextanim.description: Advance to the next animation of the current viewthing.

viewoffset.description: Sets the view offset to use for the turret.

vieworigin.syntax: vieworigin( Float x, Float y, Float z )
vieworigin.description: Set the origin of the current viewthing.

viewpitch.description: Set the pitch of the current viewthing.

viewprev.description: Advance to the previous frame of animation of the current viewthing.

viewprevanim.description: Advance to the previous animation of the current viewthing.

viewroll.description: Set the roll of the current viewthing.

viewsavesurfaces.description: Called after the model is spawned to save off the models original surfaces.

viewscale.description: Set the scale of the current viewthing.

viewscaledown.description: Decrease the scale of the current viewthing.

viewscaleup.description: Increase the scale of the current viewthing.

viewscrub.description: Set the animation time based off a floating point value.

viewsetanim.description: Set the animation absolutely based off a floating point value.

viewsetanim2.description: Set the animation absolutely based off a floating point value.

viewsetanimslot.description: Set current animation slot that sliders apply to.

viewspawn.description: Create a viewthing with the specified model.

viewthing_think.description: Called every frame to process the view thing.

viewthingnext.description: Change the active viewthing to the next viewthing.

viewthingprev.description: Change the active viewthing to the previous viewthing.

viewyaw.description: Set the yaw of the current viewthing.

volumedamage.description: Does damage to any entity within this volume.

vote.description: Player votes either yes or no.

wait.description: Door: Sets the amount of time to wait before automatically shutting. FallingRock: How long to wait before rock starts falling. MultiExploder: Sets the wait time of the explosion. ScriptThread: Wait for the specified amount of time.

waitexec.description: Executes the specified script and waits until the called thread group is finished.

waitforstate.description: When set, the player will clear waitforplayer when this state is hit in the legs or torso.

waitframe.description: Wait for one server frame (1 second/sv_fps).

waitmove.description: Move the script slave and wait until finished.

waitthread.description: Creates a thread starting at label and waits until the called thread is finished.

waittill.description: Wait until event of type name.

waittrigger.description: If true, patrol guys and running men wait until triggered to move.
waittrigger.example:
local.actor waittrigger 1
// Or
local.actor.waittrigger = 1
local.result = local.actor.waittrigger

walkto.description: Specify the location to walk to.

warmupdelay.description: Set the warmup delay before use after mounting the weapon.

watch.description: Camera: Makes the camera watch an entity. If fadeTime is specified, camera will fade over that time CameraManager: Set the current path node to watch something. SplinePath: Sets the entity to watch at this node.

watchactor.description: Makes the player's camera watch the specified actor.

watchnode.description:
Makes the camera watch based on what is stored in the camera nodes.
If fadeTime is specified, camera will fade over that time.

watchpath.description:
Makes the camera look along the path of travel.
If fadeTime is specified, camera will fade over that time.

watchstring.description:
Makes the camera watch based on a string.
If fadeTime is specified, camera will fade over that time.

wateralpha.description: Set the alpha of the water screen blend.

weapon.description:
Gives the sentient the weapon specified.
Gets the weapon.
List of names in global/weapon.scr
weapon.example:
local.actor weapon "panzerschrek"
// Or
local.actor.weapon = "panzerschrek"
local.weapon = local.actor.weapon

weapon_internal.description: Gives the actor the weapon specified.

weaponcommand.syntax:
weaponcommand( String hand, [ String arg1 ], [ String arg2 ], [ String arg3 ],
[ String arg4 ], [ String arg5 ], [ String arg6 ], [ String arg7 ] )
weaponcommand.description: Pass the args to the active weapon in the specified hand.

weapongroup.description:
Actor: Specifies weapon animation set to use in anim scripts.
Weapon: Sets the weapon group, a set of animations for actor animations scripts to use.

weaponsubtype.description: Sets the weapon's sub-type. Used by smoke grenades.

weapontype.description:
Actor: Gets the weapon type of the actor.
Weapon: Sets the weapon type.

whatis.description: Prints info on the specified entity (console command).

worldhitspawn.description: Set a model to be spawned when the weapon strikes the world.

writestats.description: Used internally to write stats to a CSV file.

yaw_offset.description: Sets the yaw offset to use for this UseObject.

yawcenter.description: Sets the yaw for the center of the turret's turning arc.

zoom.description: Sets fov to zoom to on a secondary fire.

zoommovement.description:
Sets the max speed the player can move while zoomed
(fraction of weapon's running speed)

zoomoff.description: Makes sure that zoom is off.

zoomspreadmult.description: Sets the spread multiplier for when using the zoom on a zooming weapon
